12332212121211122.content:
That night, she slept even more soundly than the previous evenings, and when she awoke, she felt even more invigorated. So much stronger - nigh invincible, even! She sat straight up, striking her arms out towards the ceiling as she stretched, and readied herself for the day ahead, not even noticing the way her body jiggled and bounced more prominently with each sudden movement.

She did, however, notice the mirror - or more specifically, what was reflected upon its surface.

It didn't register at first; she actually thought it was a window. Perhaps she had awoken in a different room, entirely. Then she placed a chubby paw upon her sagging belly, bringing it up to swollen breasts that seemed to fill the cups of her bra, and then some. She realized with dawning shock that she was not the same vixen who had entered the Ample Amphitheater. Not even the same one from the day before, perhaps. Instead she was tubbier; obese; a PIG!

And then, something else happened as she remembered how she'd gotten this way; the many challenges and trials that had earned her such fame and glory already. She wasn't fat, she was... voluptuous, sexy, incredibly appealing! She ran her paws over her generous curves; grabbed handfuls of her soft, overflowing belly; cupped her weighty rump. The thought that what she was feeling was disgusting lard began to slip from her mind, replaced with pride in her body; in her achievements. She didn't think about how she had seemingly put on almost thirty pounds these past... since last checking, instead marveling at how drop-dead gorgeous she must look. She was Mad Maria, after all! She could get any man or woman she desired! That is, if she didn't desire spilling their blood, and filling her maw, instead.

Setting aside her yearning for a good preen, now that these developments had come to light, she reminded herself that she had a duty to attend to. More than that, just thinking about getting out into that arena had her mouth watering. Gods, the scent of blood and battle was practically in her nostrils already...!

Swallowing hard, and wiping a stray strand of drool from her lips with the back of her hand, the chubby champ-in-the-making rose from the bed, and headed for the door. She had an audience waiting just for her; she could no more let them down than starve herself, especially now. She took a deep breath, pausing in the doorway, and then pressed forward.

Maria's eyes quickly scanned the seats of the amphitheater as they adjusted to the lighting changes, taking a hasty headcount before snapping down to size up her opposition. She had to blink a few times, and not just to adjust to the light.

Standing across the arena was the single biggest creature she had laid eyes on since... Well, never mind. The curious haze when she cast her mind back made that unimportant. What was of the utmost importance now was the towering behemoth already helping itself (herself?) to the victor's feast. Her victor's feast!

Ten feet tall, if she (it?) was an inch, the thing cramming an entire quiche into its gaping maw was covered in white fur, broken by black splotches. Its nose was flat and pink; its fingers shelled in some glossy, keratinous material. His(?) feet seemed protected by oddly-shaped, chitinous armour. Between bites, her teeth were seen to be broad and flat; good for grinding.

The most eye-catching, and perhaps breath-taking, thing about this behemoth was that he/it/she was wider, than tall! A circus tent would have fallen short of covering the blubber that bulged from every inch and foot of the spotted creature, an apron fit for Mealinie, God-Chef, to wear hanging down to obscure clues as to its gender, and its chest massively distorted, no help in identifying it, either. Its bulbous behind stuck out nearly as far as its stomach, serving as adequate counterweight to a swollen sack of lard that, alone, must have weighed twice as much as she did - at a VERY generous estimate.

Taking a step forward, prepared to charge, Maria stopped short as her target, the beast's meaty legs, were suddenly obscured by something just over half its size - a figure recognizable as an average-sized, non-monstrous being! Another opponent! The... human female, red of hair, and robust of figure, seemed to have wrapped herself around the monster's leg, trying to pull it down. The beast didn't seem to notice - or herfood was more important to it.

The vixen snorted angrily, drew her sword (there was no way she could punch through those foot-thick layers of lard on its legs), and ran to intercept the fight. "Stand back, you simpering sow! I'll show you how a real warrior handles such weaklings!"

"Don't do that, you fleabitten fool!" The woman tried to warn her, throwing out her hand.

Maria paid her no heed, and slashed at the creature's shin with her sword. A satisfying red line was carved through flesh and fat, and blood began to ooze from it, quickly coating the lower part of its shin.

Quite unable to perceive the moment between her attack, and this one, Maria found herself winded, on the floor, halfway across the arena. Her front side ached like she had fallen from a tree, but why? Teleporting magic wasn't supposed to do that, and anyway, who had cast the spell? Groaning, and rubbing her chest, she rose.

Still tugging at the behemoth's leg, the human woman offered a sympathetic look. "I tried to warn you. Hideously swollen with fat though it is, this thing is fast. Even I did not see it kick you!"

Seething quietly through her teeth at this perceived jab at her own figure, Maria decided to open a discourse with the woman, before she opened her throat. "Why warn me? Surely, it would be better to let it finish me."

"I'm not too proud to admit I need help tackling this monster," she replied, letting go of it for now. "With our womanly wiles combined, we can surely figure out a way to fell the foul thing."

Maria glanced at the creature, unconcernedly grazing from the banquet table, today the length of the arena, and putting one hell of a dent in it. Every second she delayed, another dish was wrested from her grasp! "Fine. If we both attack a leg at the same time, it cannot kick us both. If it does, it will fall, and we can seize the opportunity to strike a blow at its unprotected back."

The woman nodded, and drew her sword. "On three?"

Maria took her position behind the creature, and readied her sword. "One..."

The redhead readied her own for a slice. "Two..."

One big breath, in, and out. "Three!" They said as one.

Maria plunged her sword into the back of the beast's knee like an oversized acupuncture needle, while the other woman slashed a deep, nasty cut into the back of its other leg, severing muscles with flesh and fat, though her sword was buried to the hilt.

The behemoth bellowed in pain, the first real acknowledgement of their presence, and its legs gave way. The women dodged out of the way as it came crashing down on its flabby rump, causing the earth to quake. It moaned loudly, voice deepened and distorted by the thick rings of fat around its neck. It raised a hand, and Maria braced herself to lash out, or dodge, but only extended it towards the food, far out of its reach, and surely obscured from its vision by its titanic tummy. Maria saw even this was easily bigger than her; she could have embraced its side with her entire body, and sink in so far, she'd lose sight of the light of day.

"Mercy of Pomina be on this poor creature!" the redhead gasped softly, pushing her hand gingerly into its swollen side. Maria watched the rolls on her side wobble. "Its mind is completely gone! Consumed by a desire - nay, a lust! - for food!"

Maria, prodding around for a good spot in which to sink her sword, and silence the pathetic thing's mournful bellows, snarled "Do you want us to kill this thing, or feed it?"

The human woman flushed, and she hesitated, before saying...
12332212121211122.title: Reflections and Revelations

choices: Continue...
123322121212111221.content:
Maria, prodding around for a good spot in which to sink her sword, and silence the pathetic thing's mournful bellows, snarled "Do you want us to kill this thing, or feed it?"

The human woman flushed, and she hesitated, before saying "Actually, yes!"

"What?" Maria snapped, flooded with a sudden urge to seize the woman's head, and tear it clean off her shoulders. "WHAT?!"

"Let's face it, vixen. Neither of us - least of all you - need all, or perhaps any of the food on those tables," the redhead sniffed, somehow managing to look haughty while delivering this ridiculous (to Maria's ears) statement. "What we have here is a unique opportunity. A convenient way to dispose of that bewitched food, and save our figures. You can still salvage yours."

Maria bit her lip so hard, blood began to bead beneath her fangs. Just as she was opening her mouth to inform the human just how much she was going to suffer before she let her die, a simple idea, blinding in its beauty, soothed her flaring temper like a salve on a rash. "Yes. Yes, okay. You're right. I'm afraid that I, too, was... maddened by a lust for food, but your inspiring, thoughtful words have made me see the light."

"Wonderful! I knew you were a sensible, er, woman," the human chuckled, smiling proudly. "I will stay here, and soothe the creature, while you go get it some food."

Despite herself, Maria swore "Fuck you if you think I'm doing all the godsdamned work!"

Stroking the behemoth's broad belly as a mother might her child's, the redhead explained calmly "I will assist, once it has seen we're only trying to help. Until then, I will try to keep it from lashing out at us again."

Grumbling, and grinding her teeth, Maria reminded herself of her plan, and wiped her sword clean before sheathing it, and shuffling towards the tables that spanned the length of the amphitheater. Choosing one at the farthest end, still loaded with food, she surveyed her choice of dishes.

This, she saw, was the dessert course. Three-tiered cakes as big as her head, frosting a finger thick. Bowls seemingly made of sugar glass, overflowing with various candies, all unwrapped. Doughnuts big enough to wear as bracelets, with glaze, sprinkles, jelly, custard, sugar, and frosting. Fist-sized cream puffs and bon-bons. Pies with diameters the length of her forearm, oozing fruit syrups. Cobblers that must have weighed five pounds apiece, bursting with tender fruits.

Maybe... Maybe she didn't need these...

Maria sadly swallowed her drool, backed up, and seized the two table legs the shortest distance apart. Putting her enhanced musculature to the test, she dug in her heels, and pulled. It was heavy as hell, nothing but dead weight, but the table began to scrape through the dirt floor of the amphitheater. She carefully backed up towards the beast, stopped just outside its range, and moved around to the other side of the table to push it. She was sure, in its blind fervor for food, the thing would callously knock her down, or worse.

No sooner was the table within arm's reach of the tubby titan than did it grasp for nourishment, making a delighted sort of noise. A bowl, and its candy, were stuffed whole into its moist maw.

Maria resisted the urge to stab it in the hand, and made a wide berth around its front side as she went to pull a table up to the human, so she could help.
123322121212111221.title: A Monstrous Meal.

choices: Maria stands idly by, while Dotty meets her doom.
Maria has a heart, and pulls her out.
1233221212121112211.content:
The human woman was currently crooning sweet nothings to the beast, massaging the side of its soft stomach. She appeared quite enamored of it, pressing herself ever further into the squishy surface. Even if the creature noticed or appreciated this, it obviously appreciated food more.

Maria could hear the audience mumbling in dissent about the utter lack of action, and it shamed her to her core to be letting them down. She wanted to shout to them, to scream "Wait! Do not leave! Do not think any less of me! Just have patience!" but to do so would jeopardize, if not utterly torpedo, her plan. Instead, hoping they would see her, interpret her, and trust her, she looked up to them, offered up a broad grin and wink, and held a finger in front of her lips. She had a secret plan.

As the voluptuous vixen dragged the second table, from the other end of the amphitheater, over to the human, the redhead said "Perfect! And a good workout for you. Now, help me up, here, will you?"

Maria kept her mouth shut, knowing she could say nothing nice, and boosted the woman not onto the table, but up onto the behemoth's body. And people called her "mad"!

The robust redhead found she couldn't stand, her legs sunk so far into the doughy creature, so she crawled towards its chest, commanding "Bring the other tables over, and when you have them all, hand me the food from them. I will take it upon myself to feed this... Er, foul thing... Yes..."

Maria's hands longed to cave in the bitch's skull for ordering her around like some boot-licking peon, but she only grumbled "Whatever", and set about doing just that.

Ignoring the table the beast could have been said to be seated at, even if it now had no hope of reaching it, Maria pushed a few untouched dishes from its edges onto the tables next to it on her way down the line. There were three more tables on each side of the center table, all loaded with seemingly enough food to snap them in twain, though they somehow held sturdy. Either it was magic, she figured, or someone who really knew what they were doing had built them. And that raised all sorts of disturbing possibilities she had no desire to further explore.

It was hard and hungry work; sometimes, nigh-impossible. Maria soon began to sweat, and her arms to ache, legs burning, and lungs heaving. It brought her back (very briefly, and in fragments) to her training days. Her stomach roared like the beast had when fell, but she could only reassure it vaguely that everything would soon be more than okay; it would be rewarded.

Even with the last table pushed into place, Maria got no respite from the human bitch, lounging very comfortably atop the cushioned chest of their fallen foe. "About time! Now quickly, start handing things up here! Our baby's hungry; yes she is."

It took all of Maria's inner strength not to split the woman's skull for this remark as she hefted up a platter of hotdogs to her. Curiously, this platter looked tough, but edible, too. Like solid honey.

The redhead shifted, and managed to get a hold of the platter, suggesting "You ought to climb up onto the table. It'll be easier for me to reach. But don't stand in the middle; you'd only break it."

Maria, feeling again the cool calm that had come with her first notion of the plan, let the comment slide off of her, like water off a duck's beak.

"Open wide, my sweet little girl!" The redhead cooed, presenting the platter of hotdogs to the beast. "Dotty's gonna feed you! Yes she is!"

The hulking blob rather eagerly opened its mouth, and rolled out its broad, flat tongue, more than ready to eat.

Maria looked away from the spectacle, her rare spell of serenity only able to extend so far. When asked (or told), she presented "Dotty" with some new dish, not particularly caring what it was, so long as it would stop tempting her. Her stomach seemed eager to eat itself, now, unresponsive to her repeated pats, or attempts at mollifying it with words. "Soon" could not be soon enough.

After an unknown, inscrutable, hellishly boring amount of time, the vixen could see no more dishes, edible or otherwise, in sight. The last one was the chocolate cake before her, and sure enough, Dotty was demanding that, too. Wishing bitterly she could do some magic to the cake, maybe to make it explode, or something, she settled for scrawling a very rude word in the frosting with her finger before handing it up. Contemplating her chocolate-smeared finger afterwards, she wiped it on the beast's side. It would have only sharpened her hunger pains.

"Trust a mangy bitch like you..." Dotty tutted vaguely as she inspected the cake, trailing off with a small 'humph!'. Raising her voice, she lilted to the behemoth "Oh, dearest! Dotty has one last very special treat for you!"

The big, pink tongue rolled out, and the redhead placed the cake on it with a mixture of regret and joy. Their relationship would have to end here, but she had brought a lot of happiness to this poor thing, and really quite enjoyed herself doing so! And let us not forget, she had saved her own figure, as well. How clever she was!

The creature drew its tongue back into its mouth, and perhaps even chewed the cake once or twice before swallowing it. It let out a deep, pleased sigh. Was it finally satiated?

Dotty crawled onto its stomach, and to her evident surprise, found it rather more firm than she remembered. "Oh my! Are you full, my sweet?" As if scrubbing a floor, she began massaging the monstrous mammal's swollen stomach.

"Oh my!" she gasped, as if to herself. It was somehow so tantalizing, this action... This sensation...

The beast seemed pleased, too, lowing, and grinning sloppily. What a day it must have been having!

Admittedly curious, Maria pushed her hand into the side of the behemoth's stomach. Squishy fat yielded to her touch, yes, but underneath, it became taut. This thing was stuffed with food, she realized; yet she was not!

But before she could begin to put her plan into action, the surface she was leaning against inexplicably grew softer. She lost her balance, and ended up with half her face smothered by the beast's blubber before she could push herself up. It was warm and fuzzy; no wonder the bitch was enjoying it up there.

"Oh, what's this?" Dotty asked. She had noticed it, too, her hands sinking in another inch, and catching her off-guard. "Did something shift?"

As Maria watched, a sudden surge actually rippled the ample adipose of the abomination adjacent to her. Furry flesh spilled out over the nearest table by an inch. Was it trying to move?

Dotty tried to push herself up, to balance on her knees, but she couldn't get enough force against the squishy surface. "Um- Vixen?"

Maria backed away from the beast, watching it with a wary eye. She didn't like this...

Another ripple, and a definite surge. Dotty toppled forward, head over heels, coming to rest on her back like an overturned turtle on the creature's stomach. She wriggled and writhed, but couldn't push herself up. "Vixen?"

Maria turned her gaze to the front of the creature's great mass of stomach, and sure enough, with the next wave, it inched forward over the floor even more. Yet, the bulk of the beast didn't move an inch. It was getting fatter - right before their eyes!

"Vixen!" Dotty's voice was on the edge of panic, now. "Help!"

Maria turned to survey the redhead's situation. She was sinking slowly into the soft surface of the creature's stomach, further and further down. Fat was rising higher and higher around her, walling her in; trapping her. She was going to drown in it! Drown in fat!

"Vixen! Please! please! Help me!" Dotty cried, struggling futilely. "I'm sorry! I'm sorry! If you help me now, I'll return the favor later! I give you my word!"

Maria considered this. It was always handy to have someone in your pocket. But all the same, watching the bitch get crushed by poetic justice and irony would be satisfyingly sweet...
1233221212121112211.title: A Monstrous Meal (continued).

choices: Maria finds a way to satisfy her appetite.
A victory feast appears!
12332212121211122112.content:
"VIXEN!"

Ah, the anguished screams of those brought low by her hand... They were sweet music to Maria's ears. Still, she had bigger plans for this bitch.

Tensing her legs, the voluptuous vixen sprang up onto the monstrous mass of adipose, and scrambled onto the top of its rapidly-softening stomach. Finding her footing was like being out at sea in a canoe, she struggled to stay upright, but it helped anchor her when she grabbed one of the redheaded human's hands with her own two, and pulled.

With a sound not unlike a cork freed from a bottle, Dotty popped out of her imprisonment, and nearly toppled both of them. If they had gone down, Maria thought, that would have been their end. Instead, she shoved the woman off, none too gently, and then jumped from atop the beast onto the table.

Dotty regained her breath quickly, and backed far away from the creature, Maria tagging along rather more sedately. From this viewpoint, they could watch as the white-furred, black-spotted monster, ten feet tall, and already more than that wide, expanded further. Its titanic tummy grew rounder, pushing out further in front of it, and further upwards, consuming more of its field of vision. The behemoth's bulbous behind bloated, pushing it up even higher from the ground. Its tail, had it one, was nowhere to be seen, long since consumed by fat rolls. Its thighs somehow grew more thunderous, swelling like sausages. It was very odd to watch it also grow towards them as its hips widened, furry fat rolls soon pressing against the nearby tables.

The most horrifying part (at least, to Maria) was when, after it had halted its growth, it again lowed pleasurably, and used its thick, heavy, relatively-stumpy arms to rub little what it could reach of its stomach. Was it even now hungry for more?

"Alright, Dotty, you owe me one," the vixen sneered, turning towards the redhead. "That's the deal."

Dotty absently rubbed her chest as she looked down at Maria's outstretched hand, then up at her face. "Oh... Yes. Of course. One favor. You want to shake."

Maria resisted the urge to roll her eyes, and only waited. "Deal?"

"Deal," Dotty confirmed, taking her hand with a smile.

Maria smiled, too, as she gripped the woman's hand firmly. "You act like you've never shaken hands before."

"Well, not usually, no," she admitted. Her smile was growing strained. "Erm, is it supposed to be this painful?"

Maria's smile widened. "It is when I'm trying to break the bones in your hand. It will be more so when I grind them together."

Dotty's face paled, freckles now even more contrasted. "Wh-what? What did you-? Ow! You- You're hurting me!"

"That's the idea!" Maria agreed, smile reaching "beaming" status. "They don't call me 'Mad' Maria for nothing, toots!"

With this last word, she stuck her unoccupied hand into the redhead's gaping maw, and pulled down on her lower jaw. The woman tried to scream, but without her tongue to shape the sounds, it wasn't very effective.

The crunch! of Dotty's fingers breaking, and the CRACK! of her lower jaw dislocating, were simultaneous. Maria ground together the shattered finger bones until they splintered. Smile only now growing sinister, crazed, she seized Dotty's lower jaw, flapping loose beneath her face, with both her hands, brought her foot up to wedge between herself and the woman's chest, and shoved her away as she pulled backwards. With a wet tearing sound too gruesome to be here described, the bony structure, and much of its surrounding skin and musculature, tore loose from her face.

Screaming and gurgling, displaced tongue waggling obscenely in the air, blood spurting and flowing from her wounds, Dotty stumbled backwards, falling onto a table. Her hands clutched at the space where her jaw had once been; she was literally unable to grasp what had happened.

Maria made a show of inspecting the jaw, then held it up, for all the audience to see. "I wonder," she said loudly, "which one is the 'sweet tooth'?"

At long last, cheers and whistles erupted from the stands. The familiar whoops and cries rang out, and someone started up the chant "MAD MA-RI-A! MAD MA-RI-A! MAD MA-RI-A!"

Maria wrenched Dotty's left arm as she pulled her close, looking not at her, but out at her adoring audience. "Stick around! We'll be taking a small BREAK-" with this, the vixen snapped the redhead's radius "-but I know, like Dotty, here, you've only got eyes-" quick as the peck of a bird, Maria snatched one of the woman's out of her head "-FOR ME!"

The crowd went wild(er), filling the amphitheater with a noise bigger than their size belied. Even the reanimated were getting into the spirit, chanting as best their mangled mouths could, and waving (sometimes detached) limbs in the air. Ogres and cyclopes had the boomingest voices, while those of the incubi and succubae made one want to cheer along with them. A few werewolves howled for her, clapping their large paws together thunderously, and stomping their feet. Slaves whistled and cheered, and rattled their chains.

Maria felt as though if she grinned any bigger, her head would split in half - not unlike Dotty's. She was a big hit! This, she remembered, was why she came out here, and fought for her meals. This was why she had never been happier. This was why she was here- here in this world. She was, and was always meant to be...

"MAD MA-RI-A! MAD MA-RI-A! MAD MA-RI-A!"

And right now, Mad Maria was mad hungry...
12332212121211122112.title: The Vixen With a Heart of...

choices: Continue...
123322121212111221121.content:
Maria bent down, stomach squishing out over her leather greaves as she did, and drew the recently-deceased Dotty's sword from its scabbard. Holding it in her left hand, she drew her own, and strode back towards the hulking, immobilized creature in the center of the amphitheater.

Ten feet tall, when it had been able to stand, the white-furred beast's black splotches had stretched as it had become wider than it was tall, something it had achieved before Maria had ever seen it. Even so, it had just recently put on several hundred pounds, judging by the fact it was noticeably fatter now, than before its feast. Even if it had been able to support its new weight on its tree-mendous thighs, and waddle away, with its titanic tummy touching the ground (though its bulbous behind surely acted as an effective counterweight), the fact Maria had tickled the back of its patella with her sword, and Dotty had severed some tendons had permanently crippled it.

Still, it didn't appear too bothered; in fact, it had greeted its feasting, and even expansion, with the utmost delight. At the moment, it seemed to be snoozing, head nestled into the layers of fat beneath it. It had kicked her once, with startling speed, but it could hardly be a threat now... Right?

Maria circled around, approaching it from behind. It could hardly turn its head at all, and its eyes were closed. But she padded softly, and the audience fell quiet, too. She switched her grip on the swords, holding them like oversized daggers, as she came around behind the beast.

Crouching slightly, she eyed the angles, plotted her trajectory, licked her lips, and sprung!

The vixen landed on the behemoth's blubbery bum, a shifting, squishy mass that sucked at her feet like mud. Before she could fall, she plunged her swords into the creature's back, and held on tight. They worked, in essence, like the ice daggers the hardy northern races used to climb glaciers, whatever their reasons. When she gave them a little twist, they held even better.

The beast wriggled and moaned at this, pained, but could not shake itself with enough force to dislodge her. It had started out such a nice day, too!

Maria withdrew the sword in her right hand, and then plunged it back into the creature at a higher level than before. Giving it a twist to secure it, she pulled herself up with it, while drawing out the sword in her left hand, and then plunged that back in, higher than the other one. She repeated this process until she was straddling the behemoth's shoulders, though the thick layers of fat around its neck made it nigh-impossible for her to get her legs around it.

Sure that she was not going to fall off (or at least that her landing would be cushioned if she did), Maria steadied herself, brought her swords into roughly the correct position, and stabbed them deep into the monster's fat-swaddled neck.

She was rewarded immediately with a wet bellow, which might have been high-pitched, if not for the extra ton, or so, the creature appeared to be carrying. Blood gushed from its mouth and wounds, and the vixen knew she had hit at least one vital artery. It thrashed feebly, but it was so weak, and so burdened, it only managed to jiggle itself slightly. Its breaths became shallow and labored, wheezed from its chest, and then ceased completely. It closed its eyes, and slouched there where it was, propped up by its own morbid obesity.

Maria hardly felt this was impressive; a toddler with knives strapped to his eyes could have slain the stupid thing. What was going to set her apart was not even the fact she was cutting off its head right at this moment. No, they called her "Mad Maria" for a reason, and she rather suspected it was because she dared to think different.

With the behemoth's head sawed off at its shoulders, the bloody hole gaping at the ceiling, Maria reached in, and seized its trachea, reeling in its lungs, and tossing them aside. With that done, she poked her snout into the hole, and began to nibble at the meats inside. The taste was somehow familiar, but indisputably pleasing. She grinned, and ate away.

She had to lean further and further forward as she ate deeper into the creature's corpse, though she really had only just a little bit of actual "meat", due to where she was nibbling. Seeing a bite just out of reach of her jaws, she stretched and strained, but still fell short. Lunging forward, she felt her teeth close around it... and her precarious balance give way...

She slid, head-first, down into the behemoth's chest cavity, its ribcage trapping her in front, and its spine parallel with her own behind her. She had displaced its guts towards its pelvis, face mashed up against them. All around her was the beast's padding, making things quite warm. Fortunately, she could still breathe.

With little other choice, yet somehow pleased with this turn of events, Maria began to eat. The flavors of exotic organ meats filled her mouth, and traveled easily down to her stomach, roaring louder than before to be fed. She tried to comply, wriggling her arms free enough to be able to push herself up on them, and tilt her head forward to nibble at whatever was obstructing her way. It was fantastic, whatever it was, coating her mouth with a rich flavor she couldn't get enough of. But it, too, was strangely reminiscent of something...

Even upside-down, her stomach was able to begin to fill on the delicious innards of the creature, hunger gradually growing satiated, but appetite calling out for more. Eventually, eating away at the same spot revealed the light at the end of the tunnel, so to speak. A speck of whatever lit the amphitheater shone through into her dark prison, initially causing some pain, as she'd been in the dark so long.

Once her eyes adjusted, however, she raised a hand, and clawed the hole wider, peeling back layers of fur and fat, blinking as the light flooded her vision. Sweet, fresh oxygen came to her in big gasps, making her a little light-headed, and initially unable to understand the noise coming from all sides. She squirmed out, inch by inch, and shakily stood.

"MAD MA-RI-A! MAD MA-RI-A! MAD MA-RI-A!" Though some seats were now empty, many had stayed to await their hero's triumphant return. Some had feared, secretly, that it was the ignominious end of her; she'd simply suffocated after a klutzy accident. But now they told themselves (and others within earshot) they'd known all along she'd done it on purpose. That was their Mad Maria!

Maria accepted the praise without quarrel, pumping her fists in the air, and striking threatening poses. But what she really wanted was to get back to eating, and so after a minute of soaking up her (surely well-deserved) glory, she turned back to the behemoth's body.
123322121212111221121.title: The Taste of Victory.

choices: Bow out, and accept the cheers. She's already a star!
Take full advantage of this great big gift!
1233221212121112211211.content:
Maria accepted the praise without quarrel, pumping her fists in the air, and striking threatening poses. But what she really wanted was to get back to eating, and so after a minute of soaking up her (surely well-deserved) glory, she turned back to the behemoth's body.

It seemed she'd managed to eat her way out through an area with relatively little fat beneath the ribs. If she had been eating straight through the thickest part of the thing, she'd have still been in there. The thought alone had her licking her lips.

Locating her sword, she made an incision down the middle of the behemoth's chest. Then, pulling on its rib bones, one-by-one, she opened up the creature, exposing the cavity where organs had once been suspended. Its adipose-abundant abdomen still rested on its tree trunk-like thighs, arms resting limply on its swollen sides. It reminded her, absurdly, of a jack-o-lantern.

Maria patted her soft stomach as it growled, and returned to the belly of the beast. Climbing into its chest cavity, now roomy enough for her to sit in, she got down on her hands and knees to gnaw at the thickest, fattiest part of the titan's tummy, intending to eat a tunnel right through. Delicious fat (for some reason, she was reminded of pork) squished between her teeth, moist, intense flavors flooding her very being, it seemed. She began to tunnel.

Her first challenge, after clearing a space big enough for her head to get through, was making it big enough for her shoulders, she discovered. Fortunately, hers were fairly narrow. She squeezed them through. Tunneling was a matter of tearing the fat off first one side, then the other, sometimes rolling over to gnaw on the ceiling. This amused her most of all.

Her second challenge came when she tried to squeeze in past her bosom, itself constricted. She was, apparently, taking up more space than she thought. She backed up, and widened the tunnel all around, drooling enough to keep her thirst quite slaked. Pressing forward, her breasts came through easily, and then, save her rear and tail, she was completely inside the darkened tunnel, all light from behind her blocked.

She ate a wide swatch out from her right. She turned, and gnawed an equally-wide swatch on her left. Facing down, she cleaned out the bottom of the tunnel. Rolling onto her back, feeling quite pleased, she carved out the top of the tunnel. Belching tremendously, the "caverns" around her seemed to shake, and she giggled.

The vixen also found, as she went along, that she was apparently making the tunnel on the sides than on the top and bottom. She began to feel her belly drag along the ground, and when she lifted her butt, it bumped the ceiling. When this happened, she'd go back until her bosom was about where her bum had been, and widen the tunnel's top and bottom dimensions. This kept happening, but she wasn't too distressed; she was otherwise doing very well, for navigating in the dark, and not being a mole.

All good things must come to an end, and Maria came to see the light. Disappointing, as it signaled an end to her fun, but her fans were waiting on the other side! Though the hole was about the size of her fist, she decided to see if she could force her way through.

Head first, the vixen poked one ear out through the hole; then some orange fur. It began to tear like a ream of wet construction paper, requiring some effort, but yielding to her advance. Using her hands, she tore it open wide enough to get her shoulders out. Her breasts popped out next, bouncing from their inertia. Trying to use her arms to push herself out didn't work so well, so she tried steadying herself while standing up from the tunnel. This worked until her belly became wedged in the hole, simply too yielding to make itself room.

Shrugging and waving, Maria wormed her way back inside. What a shame - she was going to have to eat more of this stuff! Growing a little weary of the spectacle, she decided to widen end of the tunnel more than "just enough" to squeeze through. She tried to eat in a circular pattern, following the edges of the tunnel like a pair of scissors cutting through a dotted line.

As tends to happen, though, the circle became more like a spiral, just missing connecting. And she was rather disoriented, with no landmarks, and all the tunnel looked the same. She just wasn't sure when to stop. And really, when was she going to get a chance like this again? She'd better eat all she could of it while it was available. Even IF that meant a little more than was, perhaps, advisable. You only lived once, right?
1233221212121112211211.title: The Taste of Victory (continued).

choices: Maria gets stuck! She's too big for the tunnel.
Maria manages to squeeze through... just barely!
12332212121211122112112.content:
So it was that Maria kept going around and around, following the tunnel backwards, and widening it all around. Soon, she forgot quite what the hell she had been aiming to do in the first place; this stuff was heavenly! It was a good thing that bitch Dotty wasn't around to spoil her fun. Boy, she'd showed her...

She rolled onto her back to nibble at the "ceiling" of the tunnel she'd eaten through the deceased behemoth's stomach like a very hungry, and more than a little twisted, caterpillar, almost acknowledging, for a moment, the orange-and-white dome that obscured the lower part of her field of vision. Her brain glanced right over it, however, pleasantly overdosing on flavor divine. Her breasts looked good, though, it allowed; all showing a naughty little bit of cleavage in her hardened leather top like that. Rowr!

Abruptly, there was no more to eat. Maria blinked, and looked around; she was back in the chest cavity. She could climb out from here.

But "Fucking a..." she moaned pleasantly, stretching. Her rump wiggled in the air, her tail wagged, and her belly bumped the ground before her breasts did. "I am a little tired, after that. I should just fucking sit here, and rest, a minute."

Instead of quite sitting, she just plumped down where she was; it was comfortable enough, she found. The floor was quite well-padded.

This position grew tiring, after about thirty seconds, so the voluptuous vixen closed her eyes, and rolled onto her back, arms crooked at the elbow on either side of her chest, and hands bent at the wrist. Her knees were pulled up towards her chest, so her feet were off the ground. Always delighted by this, she squirmed and wiggled happily for a full minute, giggling to herself like a kit.

Within reach was plenty more of the sweetmeat she had most come to enjoy, so, idly, she began to tear off chunks, and chew them around, and swallow them down, savoring their flavour and consistency. She felt... comfortably full, yes, but one was allowed to indulge, on occasion. Certainly, on special occasions.

When no more was at hand, she scooted and wiggled until she found some, then continued lazily stuffing her face, and daydreaming of the ceremony whence they would crown her "Grand Champion". The Ample Amphitheater would be her domain! They would cheer her name across the land! Bards would sing her praises for ages to come!

But, not content to rest on her laurels, she would be back in that arena every... Oh, week or two, proving Mad Maria still deserved her crown. Why, they might need a bigger stadium for all her fans!

After some time, and putting dents in the "walls" that could well have made more-than-adequate entrances to two new tunnels, Maria (with some difficulty) rolled up onto her butt, remembering well now her "magic bed". A nice nap would do her wonders! Especially after this day's monster mash.

With her legs folded in the butterfly position, and her expression one of feeling perfect harmony, Maria could have passed some strange interpretation of Buddha just then. Her leather armor had loosened up at some point, as evidenced by the fact it had ridden up to cover just her breasts, and wasn't squashing her flat. Her orange- and white-furred belly was bloated enormously out in front of her, her lap cradling it as a wok cradles a basketball. She was far more engorged than ever before, the malleable fat compacting itself in her stomach, with so much company.

Now the vixen dropped to her hands and knees, looking around for the proper tunnel. Yawning widely, belly dragging on the ground (and making her crawl a ponderous waddle), the vixen prepared to slip out for her grand exit.
12332212121211122112112.title: One Beastly Appetite

choices: Now she's REALLY stuck, and eating isn't going to help!
POP! goes the weasel! Er, vixen! She's out; time for bed!
123322121212111221121121.content:
"Fuck, I'm so tired, I can barely fucking walk straight," Maria giggled dozily to herself, her swollen stomach dragging on the ground, and sticking out to the sides, making her crawl an awkward waddle.

She aimed herself at the tunnel she'd eaten (and just widened) through the atrocity's adipose-abundant abdomen, and set off. "Fucking magic bed, man. It is the shit. Gonna be so totally godsdamn bitchrod when I wake up..."

The journey went well, if ponderously, for approximately two feet. Progress halted when, after clearing the entrance to the tunnel, Maria's bloated belly became wedged against the sides and bottom of the tunnel, and her butt, held up in the air by necessity at this point, could slide no further along the ceiling.

"Ugh, fucking c'mon, man, what the fuck?" She groaned, trying, but unable, to press forward. "What, are these fucking tunnels collapsing, or some shit? Fuck, I bet that's it. What kind of shitty, fuck, I don't know, foreman built this shit?"

She backed out, answering her own question with a scowl. "A stupid shitty one; that's who."

With another groan, Maria realized she was actually almost dreading having to eat her way out. It still tasted really good, and she wasn't exactly tired of it... But she felt like it was, perhaps, time to move on to something new. And that couldn't happen until she had some sleep.

"And I'm not about to sleep in this shitty collapsing carcass!" she vowed, to no one in particular. "Let's do this shit!"

Any real animosity towards this course of action vanished with the first mouthful of springy, juicy fat. It really was still so good...

For the final time, the vixen ate her way out of the situation, being rather generous in how much she bit off each time, just in case it decided to be a wise-ass, and shrink again. But even when the tunnel was big enough for her voluminous mass to fit through, she was having trouble just moving through. She grumpily attributed this to her growing tiredness inhibiting her cognitive and locomotive abilities. If she could just get to her "fucking magic bed", she was sure, she would be better than fine.

In reality, her locomotive issues could be attributed to her engorged, ever-expanding belly. It was swelling to such proportions that she could only have one knee touching the ground at a time, the other forced up and out by the swell of her stomach. The ground was at least slick enough for it to slide across without much trouble, though she was getting tired of having her bum rammed against the ceiling all the time.

The end was drawing near, however. It was just over an arm's-length away, in fact. Too far for her to pull herself out just yet, but a foot more, and she'd have it! As soon as she stuffed these chunks of tunnel down, she'd be home free...

Maria scootchedforward...

The tunnel tightened around her waist...

She grasped the edges; dug her fingers in...

POP! "Uhf!" Her exit was less graceful than she'd planned, executed by her accidentally tumbling out, head over heels, onto the floor, landing on her butt with a loud SMACK! as her swollen stomach slapped the ground, landing between her open legs.

Still, the audience cheered and hollered, whooped and whistled, screamed and shouted "MAD MA-RI-A! MAD MA-RI-A! MAD MA-RI-A!"

Grinning, the vixen struggled to her feet. For a few seconds, she cradled her gargantuan gut with one hand, and waved with the other. But that quickly became too much strain, so she hefted her belly in both hands, and waddled awkwardly from the Ample Amphitheater, never having been so proud, gratified, or stuffed in her life.

"Fuck, but I feel good..." she laughed to herself, still beaming.

It was a relatively short trek to her room, and the sight of her "magic bed" alone had her feeling relieved. Anxious as she was to drop in, she first dropped trou, kicking the leather greaves into a corner as restricted flesh sprung out, taking pressure off of her she hadn't known was there. When she removed her top, she felt she could breathe deeper than before, like bent ribs were springing back into place. Her belly quite enjoyed its regained freedom, too, hanging out comfortably over the waistband of her panties.

Still, as Maria sat down on her bed, in just her undergarments, she picked up her bloated belly again, and stroked it lightly. It was magnificent to be so full; transcendent to be engorged with the finest foods. She rubbed, and held, and patted, and caressed her belly, loving how it felt, inside and out, even if she did not quite grasp how much there was to feel...

The vixen laid down like this: hands cradling, protecting, her overly-pregnant-looking belly.

Her last thought, before sleep stole away with her, was '...Beef. That stuff. It tasted of beef...'

With a stretch of her arms, Maria awoke to a new day.

"Ah, I feel quite reinvigorated, and able to take on just about any challenge!", claimed Maria as she made to get up for another round of eating and slaughtering. But as she went to move, she noticed something odd. Quite odd, in fact. Though she had slept in the bed she believed to be magical, it appeared to her that she was having much more difficulty getting out of bed.

"What's going on?", she asked. "Why do I not have the strength of an army, with all the food I consumed?". Maria was so busy trying to figure out her dilemma that she barely noticed an announcement for her to be ready and in the arena in 10 minutes. Deciding she had better figure it out fast, she set to work in an attempt to understand her current situation.

"Let's see, when I first arrived I ate food from numerous events and slept in this bed, I would not only gain weight, but the strength to keep moving as if I had only procured a few pounds. Then with yesterday's event, I only consumed meat, fat, and other portions of that strange creature. Huh, well it seems to me that...", and then a lightbulb went off in the vixen's mind.

"It's only the food that makes you gain equal strength, but since I ate from the monster, I gained weight without the added bonus!". Having it only taken a few minutes for the fox to realize how it all worked out, she decided to get a look at herself and make any adjustments to her armor so that she would be able to comfortably and efficiently complete the day's challenge. Walking over to the mirror in her chambers, Maria noticed that devouring pieces of that beast had added quite a few pounds to her frame. Firstly, her stomach, although being smaller than when it was prior to her slumber, was still girthier than it had been before she gorged herself on the beast's bounties. Her bust had also grown slightly, her arms had gotten slightly thicker and a tiny bit heavier, as did her already thick thighs and calves. Lastly, her large posterior had gotten even bigger, wobbling more with each step and causing her to gather more momentum when she would break out in a run.

"It doesn't seem too severe, but I'll definitely have to avoid consuming anything other than food specifically put out on tables.", spoke the fox. Finally getting around to struggling into her armor, it took her the last few minutes she had before going out to face the next event.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Maria arrived at the gate leading to the arena, and was waiting for the announcement that, any second now, would be calling her in to provide some more gore-filled, gut-filling entertainment to the spectators. "I just have to remember to avoid everything other than the food on the tables.", Maria whispered to herself, in an attempt to make sure she would not forget such an important detail any time soon. "I think I might have seen her..." Maria said slyly. "But the last time I'd seen her, she was dead."

"Dead!?" Bella squealed. "Oh, my poor sister..."

"Yep; dead. It looked like she'd been attacked by a wild animal, or something. Her throat was torn open, and big chunks were taken out of her belly and side..."

"Oh! Oh, dear!"

"... Huh?" Bella's plaintive squealing was slowly being replaced by confusion.

"She'd gotten so fat, she couldn't move... Not nearly as big as you, though..."

"... Wh- wh- What?"

"It was so easy. She was so juicy, and tender... No need to cook her; her flesh just fell off the bone..."

"... N-no..." Confusion gave into horrible realization...

"Her blubber just melted in my mouth... Creamy, and rich..." Maria looked to be in a dreamy haze as she recalled the porcine sister's taste.

"... No..."

"I only wish I could've stuck around to finish her..."

"... Y-you... Monster..."

"I didn't even get the chance to sample her ham..."

"Monster!" And horrible realization gave into rage. Bella began thrashing about, trying her best to strike at the cruel vixen; all she could do was make herself jiggle.

"I certainly won't make that mistake again."

"... W-what?" Bella found her way back to "confused" once more.

"I'm getting hungry again," Maria said, hoping to make her intentions crystal clear to her prey. She even rubbed her round, white-furred belly and licked her lips, just for emphasis.

"Nooooooooooooooooooooooooooo!" Bella squealed. She began thrashing once more, this time to escape; of course, this effort was also fruitless.

Maria chuckled, and hopped down off of the blubbery swine.

"I'll make sure I finish every last bit this time..." she ran a claw against the porker's well-padded belly, raking the soft flesh and leaving marks. Bella winced. "I don't think I'll bother killing my prey, this time... Let's see what 'live meat' tastes like..." Maria's descent into "the dark side" was complete. She even punctuated it with a cackle.

At about this time, Maria's eyes had fully adjusted to the dim light of the room. She wasn't in a dungeon, or a cell...

She was in a kitchen!

There were numerous counters, each topped with dough-covered rolling pins, oily cutting boards with bits of onion and potato clinging to them, mixing bowls, suspiciously-clean butcher knives, or water basins.

There were five vault doors; one was open, though. In that open vault were shelves upon shelves of foodstuffs: Mountains of potatoes, walls of flour sacks, stacks of raw steaks, innumerable casks of what was presumably alcohol of some sort. The voracious vixen could only assume that the other "vaults" held roughly the same things. They weren't vaults, but massive larders.

There were dozens upon dozens of ovens, lined up against a wall; enough to accommodate a thousand turkeys. Of special note were a couple of overly-large ovens, each of which looked capable of housing three elephants, side by side... Or one enormous pig.

And what was right by Maria?

Maria confirmed her suspicions when she glanced to the side of Bella and saw a massive roasting pan and a veritable vat of stuffing.

"It seems somebody else was already planning on eating you..." Maria mused. She gave the pan a light kick. "And a feast, they would have had, indeed."

Bella continued to squeal, louder and louder.

"Silence, pig," Maria ordered. When the pig did not silence itself, Maria grabbed a large unpeeled onion, about the size of Bella's head, and jammed it in the porker's mouth.

"That's better."

Maria was in the middle of the biggest kitchen she'd ever seen, with the biggest meal she'd ever have.

"Hell. I've got the tools right here... Why not cook you?"

Bella closed her eyes tight.

"Live, of course." The vixen jabbed the sow right in the middle of her doughy gut.

"But! Do I have that sort of patience..?"

Shortly after Roul gave his explanation to them, both Aimée and Aveline had this "Oh, that explains it" expression on their plump faces, where they then turned their heads to look at one another, nodding yes once, and turned to face Maria, bowing like they did with Roul. From there, they spoke toward Maria using the commoners language and Aveline said, "Our apologies, Lady Maria. We were unaware that you do not speak our country's native tongue. I am Aveline, and this is my cousin Aimée." "If there is anything you need, please let us know, and we'll be able to provide you some assistance, Lady Maria." Aimée answered, speaking shortly after her equally large cousin was done talking. From there, both maids left Maria and Roul, as they both gathered Maria's things and carried them inside, where Roul lead the plumped-up Maria toward one of the large guest suites on the 3rd floor, right next-door to his master bedroom.

Though on the way there......
124111111231.title: Learning To Reach Out

choices: Roul & the 2 maids left the guest room to go to sleep for the night.
Roul's sister suddenly appeared to hug her "big" brother.
Actually, something else happened in the process.
1241111112311.content:
"So, um.....Roul? What exactly did you say to those two anyway?" Maria asked, trying her best to start up a conversation with the fat regal fox to pass the time. After all, the giant mansion that he calls home was shockingly huge! So it was basically going to take a while before they reach the guest room on the 3rd floor. Fortunately for Maria, Roul spoke back to her and replied, "Do you mean Aimée and Aveline, ma chérie? Well, I was asking them how my sister and the other members of Château Couture were simply faring while I was away on business, that's all."

This sort of news came as somewhat of a surprise to Maria. Besides, she didn't know that Roul had a sister. So in response, looked back at the plump chivalrous fox and said, "Really? I wasn't aware that you actually had a sister." "Yes, indeed I have a sister, mademoiselle Maria. Though to be more precise, Céline is merely my younger sister." Roul answered, as the two fat raccoon maids split away from their beloved master and his guest, heading toward a large but lavishly decorated elevator, while the two fat foxes approached the spacious flight of stairs that led to the mansion's upper floors.

"I, um......I don't mean to offend you or your sister, Roul, but.......how old is your sister?" Maria asked, obviously feeling a little flustered, just as she thought to herself and said, "Wait a sec, why am I even stuttering? Come on, Maria; What the hell is wrong with you? Why are you even liking this guy, anyway?" Although her conscience was bickering at her for beginning to develop a feeling or two toward the tubby regal fox, Maria's ears were still listening to what Roul had to say, as the two fat foxes climbed up the stairs, while Roul continued speaking to Maria and answered, "Well you're certainly a curious vixen, Maria. Though if you want to know so desperately, ma chérie; I am currently at the age of 23 years, while my sister Céline is merely 4 years younger than yours truly."

After doing bit of math from what he told her, Maria found out how old Roul's sister and said, "So, she's 19 years old." Roul turned his head to look at Maria and nodded at her in response, as the fat fox continued speaking and replied, "Although she is actually 19 years of age, Céline happens to look only a year younger than her actual age. However, while I happen to be in charge of our family's business in the nearby town, it is my beloved sister's handiwork in creating all of those regal and elegant dresses you have seen back in my restaurant. That gown you are currently wearing? It is just merely one of the many dresses she has designed and created, ma chérie."

Once they were halfway up the large flight of stairs, Maria shifted gears a little on the conversation topic. After all, Maria started to become more curious about where Roul, his sister, and the mansion's residents originated from. Still, her curiosity the best of her somewhat, as she then spoke toward Roul and asked, "So.....where did you and the other people in your "Château" came from, exactly? I mean, I haven't heard anybody speaking like what you said to those two maids until today."

Obviously being aware of the plumped-up Maria's growing curiosity, Roul decided to give an explanation to his vulpine guest and answered, "Well then; If it is knowledge that you seek, then I will be willing to provide you with an answer or two, ma chérie Maria. You see, Céline and I, along with the others who came here to live here, have traveled quite a rather long distance from La Principauté de Rois. In the commoners' tongue, it stands for "The Principality of Monarchs" when one translates the language of my native country."

"Not to get you mad or anything like that, but why do I get a weird feeling that your country is filled with a lot more nobles and people like that?" Maria asked, cocking an eyebrow out of questioning Roul about his native homeland. Fortunately, he knew what she was talking about, as the tubby fox spoke to her and replied, "I can understand your suspicions, Maria. However, you happen to be correct on one matter; my country is mostly filled with the rich upper-class and middle-class, due to my homeland's excessive overabundance of wealth. In a way, you could say that The Principality of Monarchs is one of the wealthiest nations on the continent, probably one of the wealthiest in the world if it ever devolves into such an expensive but trivial matter."

From listening to what he had to say, Maria could understand that Roul and company were definitely not from around here, but it was good to know that he was being honest as to where he and his sibling originated. Then, Maria, doing her best to avoid asking Roul how rich was he, spoke toward the tubby chivalrous fox and said, "I'm guessing you had a hand in crafting the town I met you in earlier into a bustling city, huh?"

"*sigh* It is true, mademoiselle; I guess you could say that it was mostly my doing in crafting the small town of Sulvale into the bustling and still-growing metropolis it is today and will eventually become. After all, my family happens to be one of the wealthiest Monarch Houses in my homeland. The others being House Chevalier, House Lévesque, House Marchand, and House Villeneuve." Roul answered, letting out a sigh of feeling frustrated by merely a slight margin. Not enough to be very angry, but just enough to feel annoyed that his family and their extremely overabundant wealth got involved.

Though once the two pudgy foxes finally reached the 3rd floor, the conversation between the two still continued, as Maria noticed a bit of the subtle annoyance on Roul's slightly plump snout and said, "It sounds like you seem upset about your family helping out in expanding Sulvale." "*sigh* Although I am glad for my family to send some assistance in expanding Sulvale and it's economy, ma chérie. Believe me, I am. It's just that.....it's been like this for me and my sister our whole lives; Our parents and family members spoiling us like we're still kits. Even though Céline manages to tolerate the excessive amount of attention thrown in our direction, I just-" Roul answered, just as Maria understood what he was trying to say, causing her to interrupt him and replied, "It's okay, I understand. You just wanted to prove your family you could handle yourself."

Finally, after making their way up the flight of stairs and down a long spacious hallway, Maria and Roul arrived at the assigned guest room, just as they entered the lavishly large room, noticing that Aimée and Aveline were sorting through Maria's stuff, unpacking, and storing the clothes, since the two rotund raccoon maids arrived before the two fat foxes did.

From what Maria saw before her eyes was a room meant for a girl who was super rich. It had a massive King-size bed, lined with plush silk bedsheets and large pillows as soft as clouds. Other than the heavenly soft bed, the carpet was an orange hue and blissfully plush, as a full-body mirror was propped up on the wall, and a few other fancy and elegant furniture found inside the vast and lavishly decorated room, along with a very large and spacious closet.

Then, after Aimée and Aveline finished unpacking and storing Maria's personal items in the drawers of the cabinets.......
1241111112311.title: Maria's Curiosity & Roul's Homeland

choices: Put the investigation off, live as plump nobility!
No more delays, I'm getting to the bottom of this!
12411111123111.content:
Maria heard the door close behind her. She was alone in the lavishly posh room. Seeing nothing else to do but sleep, she waddled over to the tall, ornate wardrobe to see if there was any sleepwear. To her satisfaction, she found a large nightgown made of sleek white velvet, and a matching nightcap she found a bit silly. She set the nightcap on a nearby end table, and when trying on the large gown, she was only mildly surprised to find it fit her large form properly. She waddled to the mirror to glance at herself, and saw a very heavyset vixen, as large as Roul was, with a very luxurious nightgown on. She gripped her sagging belly absentmindedly and was surprised at its softness! The meal had definitely digested by now, albeit faster than the normal dish. Lobo was to blame, she knew well, but another thought popped into her mind - living a life of pampered luxury with Roul. B-but... I'm a warrior, an adventurer! I can't just settle down and be with Roul... she pondered, her mind constantly going back to Roul's largeness.

It weirded her out, but the more she thought about it, the more the idea of being the lady of Roul's life seemed more and more appealing. It was certainly easier than being an adventurer, scrapping for food and coin and always in harms way. Living here, as a noblegirl in this town, being fed grapes, living a life of luxury, and cuddling with Roul's plump... she stopped herself before she thought any more on it, scrunching her face in disdain. It was too late in the night to make a decision, she would think about it in the morning.

Waddling over to the bed, she slowly heaved herself under the covers and slept peacefully, the soft covers cradling her bosom and belly very gently.
The next morning, she awakened to the sound of birds and Aimée and Aveline over in the next room, tending to Roul's needs. They'd be here any minute, what was her decision?
12411111123111.title: A Peaceful Slumber

choices: Aimée & Aveline, who entered to wake up Maria.
Roul, who came to possibly check up on her.
Actually, it was a fat young vixen. Could this be Roul's sister?
124111111231111.content:
Despite her best attempts to block out her feelings toward the fat vulpine nobleman, Maria couldn't get her mind off of Roul. After all, he was very gentlemanly toward her, as well as giving her a place to stay. "*Sigh* .....Who am I kidding? I can't help but love that blubbery fox. I mean, sure it means that I'll become just a fat ball of fur, but...." She pondered, having this odd but pleasuring urge to play with her plump belly a little, thinking about her decision, as she continued, "....Maybe...maybe becoming a fat noblewoman wouldn't be such a bad thing."

Eventually coming to a conclusion, Maria decided to give being a member of nobility a shot, just as she heard the bedroom doors open up, revealing none other than.....
124111111231111.title: The Life Of The Rich And Rotund

choices: Yes! Yes Roul I will!
This is all so sudden... is she truly ready to be tied down?
1241111112311112.content:
Roul, in all his handsome glory, came into the room cautiously. "Forgive the intrusion, my dear. I simply wished to make sure everything was to your liking." Maria smiled seeing her love. "Oh yes, Roul, everything is simply...divine." She paused for a second thinking how a noblewoman would speak. She walked over to him and hugged him tightly, which he happily returned.

"Excellent my dear, I want only for you to be happy here." He said smiling and looking down into her eyes.

"Oh, I am Roul, I am. Happier than I ever was...." She looked back into his. "Infact... I think... I think I've decided to stay."

"Why... that's wonderful news my sweet Maria." He smiled bigger and planted a soft kiss upon her lips.Maria moaned softly into the kiss as she stood on her tip toes to kiss him back.

"Maria... I... I know we've only just met... but I was hoping... Wishing even... That you might do me the honor,,, Of being my bride. You would be the most cared for and pampered vixen in all the countryside."

Maria looked at him with a bit of shock for a moment as she thought about it.

She was in love with Roul. there was no denying it. Hell since she first met him she fantasied about being his fat little wife. Her mind raced and fantasized about standing in the alter in her dress. Of kissing Roul and becoming his wife, of having his children. Of growing old with him as a pampered fat vixen, servants at her every beckoned call. She smiled inside...

But if she did marry Roul, her life as a warrior would truly be over...
1241111112311112.title: Roul, who came to possibly check up on her.

choices: From there, Maria gets up & decides to get dressed while Roul waits outside.
Skip to when Roul & Maria enter the dining room for a large breakfast.
Actually, something else happens instead.
12411111123111122.content:
Hearing the very words that Roul spoke from his snout, Maria was left at a mental crossroad, unable to decide on how to respond toward the pump fox's request of love. After all, she never expected Roul to ask such a question so sudden, and this was a lot to take in, since she only met the rotund vulpine merely a day ago. Becoming somewhat confused, Roul carefully sat down beside the plump Maria, looking at her with a sense of concern, and asked, "....Maria? Are you feeling alright, ma chérie?"

"*sigh* ....To be honest, this....t-this is all so sudden, Roul. I mean, I've only just met you , an it takes time for someone to say yes when it c-comes to marriage." Maria answered, stuttering a tiny bit, pushing the chubby index fingers on her plump paw-like hands out of hesitation. Besides, marriage was a life-changing event that is a serious commitment to endure. Although he was slightly disappointed by this, Roul also understood that he simply rushed things, which he considered as something callous for someone of his stature.

In response, his lips curved into a caring smile, his voice both understanding and apologetic as he replied, "My apologies, my dear. It was insensitive of me to ask such a thing so quickly." Inevitably, Maria felt bad about turning his engagement with a hesitant tone, where she then spoke back and explained, "It's not your fault, Roul. Believe me, I love you. It's just that....I, um.....I want to get to know you better. You know, develop a real relationship before putting on a wedding ring."

Carefully listening to Maria's words, Roul began to understand what she was saying to him. From there, he laid a plump paw-like hand on Maria's fat belly underneath the silk blankets, reassuring her that he understood what she was saying, as he then spoke toward the fat vixen and said, "It's okay, ma chérie. I understand what you are suggesting."
12411111123111122.title: All So Sudden

choices: Here comes the first course!
Skip after breakfast, Roul teaches Maria how to live the noble's life!
124111111231111222.content:
Maria got dressed in a blue, ornate, and yet understandably large daygown she pulled from the wardrobe, considering her black dress from the night before was in the laundry. Having taken more account for her appearance than she had on the road by applying necessary cosmetics, she finally emerged from the bedroom, truly looking like that of a noblewoman of her size.

"You look beautiful, ma chérie!", Roul said, kissing Maria's paw with a tender kiss. Maria blushed, completely enamored with the blubbery fox gentleman.

Roul retracted his kiss and offered his own paw, Maria gladly accepting it with a tight squeeze. The two corpulent foxes waddled into the dining room hand-in-hand, the clinking of dishes being heard from platters and silverware being set. Maria couldn't help but gawk at the fanciness of the dining hall, with its chandelier hanging below a mural of chubby vulpine angels, and well far above the long and white tablecloth-covered dining table.

Maria and Roul wobbled over to the closest end of the table. Roul pulled out a large chair, obviously shaped for a more larger posterior, motioning for his lover to take a seat with a chubby paw. Maria smiled warmly and turned around, taking her seat with a not-so-slight creak from the chair. She was fascinated with how large she was becoming, feeling her corpulence spill over the armrests on the chair ever so slightly. Roul took the seat to Maria's left, and thus, breakfast had begun, Aimée setting down large covered dishes and Aveline handing Maria and Roul their napkins. Roul smiled warmly towards his plump lover, and simply stated, "Bon appetit!" Breakfast had begun.
