The latest room that the cat and dog found themselves wandering into was much like the past ones they'd made it through. Locked doors and tables with something on them. But here, things were a little different. The locked door (made of wood) had two small holes in it, about the size of a small jewel. More importantly, there were seven different tables, all of them loaded with stacks of baked goods. Cookies, muffins, cakes, donuts, danishes, pastries and fancy breads all sat on different tables, seven in all, as if they'd come fresh out of an oven, with heavenly smells to match,

Mimi was the first to see the latest note from the Lipomancer, located on the floor in the center of the room. Here, the name of the game was to discover two rubies hiding underneath the food on two tables of the seven available. Upon discovering these rubies and putting them into the door's holes, they could keep moving. However, the food was magically enhanced - whenever a piece of food was to be touched, it would automatically fling itself into the person's mouth with whom it made contact. And there was enough food here for a small army, to make matters worse. Compounding the situation more, the Lipomancer added that he'd thrown an extra hazard into the game. With every table completed without a ruby found, the other tables' food would become still more fattening. At the outset of the game, the eater would gain 50 pounds from completing a table - that number would rise 25 pounds each incidence. 75 after two, 100 after 3, 125 after 4, 150 after 5. Which means a potential 500 pounds would be added onto someone's body in a worst-case scenario. That said, the tables hiding rubies would not affect their eaters.

Upon hearing about this new rule, Jon's mouth started watering. If things went wrong here, he'd regain his prior weight, close to 1,000 pounds. As unappealing as that sounded to part of him, the other part (the one with the curse) was truly excited.

"I'll start eating so we can look," Jonathan offered at the beginning of the trial proper. "You had to take a big hit in the other room." He was equally hoping he'd find the rubies early and not find them at all. Mimi pointed him toward a pile - the one loaded with donuts. He immediately started eating, half wanting to treasure the sweet and fatty flavors, half wanting to complete the table's food so he could get the new weight on him quickly. Just by sweeping his hand across the table, treat after treat flung themselves directly into his mouth, and in just a minute, the table became barren, with no gemstone to be found.

"Damn," Mimi said, just as the husky dog let out a burp. Though his 500-pound frame didn't make it too obvious, 50 new pounds had made themselves at home on his body. Without even thinking or consulting with his partner, Jonathan walked to the next table over - the one lined with thick cakes - and triggered another eating frenzy, again coming away fruitless when it came to the two leaving the room. Rubbing his belly as the food settled, turning instantly to fat, Jonathan was satisfied with how things were going, relishing the 125 pounds newly added to his body.

He was all set to eat more before Mimi finally stopped him. "Jonathan, I appreciate your... willingness... to eat here, but we really need to plan better than just attacking a random table," the cat said. "Plus, you're already more than a hundred pounds bigger. Let me take the next table," she said. Mimi hesitantly walked up to the cookie table and started touching treats, letting them flow into her mouth. Jonathan sat back and watched with happiness - she was getting bigger, just as the curse wanted him to like - before he found himself drawn to the muffins. Mimi, busy eating, didn't notice as Jon started eating again, and when the last cookie disappeared to reveal a ruby, he didn't hear her excitement. "Not only am I not gaining weight for that, but we're getting out of here!", she excitedly said, only to turn and see the final muffin disappear down Jonathan's throat. Mere minutes after he had lost 450 pounds, the husky was quickly tubbing up, another 100 pounds on his frame for a total of 225 pounds gained in just the last seconds. What's more, the dog happily burped and rubbed his belly again, lost in a state of bliss.

Despite the groups best efforts, they were no match for the Gumyums. For such tiny creatures they were surprising strong and fast, which the group learned the hard way. At the start of the fight J.T. began an incantation, hoping to reinforce themselves with some ents. So concentrated on his spell, he did not notice a red gumyum dash towards him. Before he got halfway done with the spell, he was knocked out from a quick jab.

Marsha, while having better luck with her spells, could not keep up with the overwhelming number coming from all sides. As a last ditch effort, Marsha prepared to unleash one of her most powerful spells. She never got to finish the cast however, as a sneaky foe had climbed a nearby tree to drop a rock on the mage’s head.

Hearing a thud, Mimi got a glance of her last companion falling. Fear flooded the thief, knowing she could not win this fight alone. Panic and selfishness took over the girl as she attempted to flee, leaving her friends to their fate. Unfortunately for her, she was not careful and tripped over a fallen tree branch. Before she could get herself up, she felt a huge force hit her in the head, causing the world to go black.

Mimi groggily awoke an hour later. Her head still dazed out, she didn't question why she couldn't move most of her body. While trying to recall what happened, she noticed she moving. Did she fall asleep on a cart? A sudden bump shifted the thief’s head, giving her a quick glance at her friends tied up, being carried by strange creatures. Memories of the previous fight flooded the girl’s brain, getting her out of her stupor. Instinctually the girl tried to struggle, only confirming the fact she already knew, that she was tied up as well. The Gumyums apparently were professionals at capturing people as the ropes gave no budge.

Abruptly Mimi was propped up against a wall, finally giving her a better view of the situation. She found herself in a small enclave, surrounded by woods on all sides. Besides some ruins and a wagon, there was not much to the area. Martha was right next to her, still apparently knocked out from their previous encounter. J.T. on the other hand was on a stone table in the distance, with a strange cloaked woman checking him out. While Mimi wanted to shout at her for her freedom, she knew she couldn't as the group was smartly gagged. All she could do was listen in and pray that an opportunity would present itself.

“Yes, he will do fine for her majesty,” the hooded figure cackled. “As promised, you can keep the others.” Swiftly J.T. was throw into the back of the wagon by the Gumyums. As the wagon slowly headed into the distance, the Gumyums turned their attention back to the girls. Picked back up, Mimi was dragged to what would be her final destination.

At some point during their forced trip, Martha had woken from her unplanned nap. Martha as well tried to struggle before realizing she was having no such luck. Turning her head a tad, she crossed paths with Mimi’s gaze. Martha’s eyes were full of fear, believing that this would be both of their ends. Though Mimi didn't want to admit it, she was starting to believe that as well.


Eventually the two found themselves entering a strange village, presumably the home of their captors. Home might have been kinda of a stretch though, as neither of the girls saw any type of house. What they did see was a large cauldron, with some strange markings on the side, containing a glowing liquid. Another member of the gumyum tribe stood on top of the pot, slowly stirring the liquid with a wooden spoon. Without warning, tons of gumyums seemed to spawn from this pot, slowly climbing out of the goo. While some walked off in various directions, most of the newly created creatures slowly marched to an unknown destination around the corner. The girls got an answer to where they were headed off to as they rounded the bend, though they wished they hadn’t.

Around the corner laid a huge blob of an elf girl. From a distance one could be forgiven for thinking that she was a house because she easily was the size on one. Fat rolls cascaded her body, with massive breasts laying on top of them. Her appendages were mostly sucked into her body, with only her hands and feet being barely visible. Her wide thighs and gargantuan ass were battling her belly to make themselves visible, currently doing a pretty good job. On top of all the fat laid her head, way less massive then the rest of her body but still had a double going on triple chin with some chunky cheeks. Her face wore a blank expression, as if she was in another world.

Martha and Mimi were so shocked by this discovery, it took them a couple seconds to notice what happened to the gumyum line. The group slowly climbed the expansive body of the elf girl, almost like explorers climbing a massive mountain. When a few finally made it to the top, the girl slowly opened her mouth, allowing them access to march straight through. One after one, the tiny creatures marched to their doom, straight into the girl’s waiting mouth until there were none left. As if on queue, as soon as they all finished their task more tiny footsteps could be heard behind them, as another group prepared their own climb. It would seem that this was to be their fate. Horrified, the girls went back to struggling against their bindings. Just like before however, the rope didn’t budge at all.

They continued through the strange village, finding more girls in similar positions as the elf earlier. All were massive blobs of their formers selves. A human girl laid on the left with breasts so massive they fell over her extended belly. A cow girl on the right was so enormous that her GumYums had to build structures to climb her.

Eventually the two girls found themselves entering what seemed to be the only human structure in the village. It seemed to be a storage area of some kind, as the place was loaded with extras of the enchanted cauldrons. In the center rested an ancient contraption, that they were being brought towards. The girls were finally put down facing towards the strange device.

As if it sensed their presence, the device seemed to turn on. A rainbow of colors seemed to erupt, as words began to form on the front of it. A spiral pattern suddenly started to form around the words, forcing the girls to stare at the device. Finally the words formed stating two instructions, relax and eat. With the device fully operational, the two girls found their minds being cleared of everything but these commands. Memories of previous adventures, friends, and lovers were locked away inside their brains. Both girl’s eyes slowly started become glassy as they stopped struggling.

With the device doing its job on pacifying the girls, they were slowly moved over to a pair of the cauldrons. The Gumyums moved the girls like rag dolls, positioning each girls breasts to point into a pot. The gags and ropes were removed, as they were no longer necessary. Now with their captives all set up, the show could begin.

A huge army of Gumyums entered the room, making a beeline straight towards the girls. Just like outside, they climbed up the two dazed girl’s bodies and entered open mouths. Though their minds were lost, they could still taste the almost disgustingly sweet candymen enter their bodies. They could also feel their bodies slowly start to bloat up from all the empty calories. As they continued to swell up their breasts started lactating, emptying into the awaiting cauldrons. After the first drop of milk hit the pot, the weird inscriptions on the side started to light up. The magic of the cauldrons slowly started to take form, as the milk inside was turned to match the glowing liquid from before. After their pots were full of strange liquid, they were herded outsides to join their fellow captives in forced gluttony.

A week later a wagon slowly pulled up to the strange village. While the delivery of fresh pots was a regular occurrence for the village, the driver of the carriage was. Apparently the Queen of Tarts had decided to visit her creations on this day to marvel in their work. While the feeders continued their marches towards their victims, the other Gumyums bowed and cheered at their masters visit.

As her servants delivered the cauldrons, she marveled in some of her creation’s works. She gaped on how big her favorite victim had become. The elven girl had stupidly tried to overthrow her and payed the price. She now must have weighed at least a ton, maybe even more. As she took in the massive fat rolls, the jumbo breasts and juicy bottom a sudden heat took over her. After calming herself down she decided that the elf would have to become her new bed or throne, sending a message back to her castle to gather some slaves to transfer the elf.

As she continued her way towards the storage room, the Queen noticed two new additions to the GumYums lair. She wasn't familiar with the chubby bunny but she definitely remembered the obese cat girl. The cat was one of the newest adventurers to try to take on the lipomancer, and now she shared the fate of most who tried. The girl was now three times the size of when she entered her kingdom and only growing fatter by the minute. Even if she could free herself from the spell, she couldn't escape her fate as she was now immobilized by her own body. After a quick fondling of once proud thief, the queen chuckled as she left the foolish girl to her fate.

It was another plain day in the plain village of Little Silverhorne for a plain cowgirl....

Sally sighed as she thought this, and hauled up the last bucket of water from the well. She then placed the metal handle over a wooden rod with the other one and hoisted them over her shoulders, beginning to plod down the long path back to the farm. As she carried the heavy buckets on her back, the cowgirl had to admit, farm work may be dull, but at least it kept her in shape. She preferred helping her parents do all this work and having a thin, relatively toned body to being a doughy housewife like some of the girls her age. Yet it was still hard for a young girl at the age of nineteen, being tied down to one place.... She thought it was silly, but Sally has always had an adventurous spirit, sometimes daydreaming about going out into the world, exploring the ends of the earth, meeting new and interesting people, and finding lost treasures....

Then again, finding a man and settling down was also somewhat appealing to the young cowgirl, especially if that man was the young wolf who moved into the house by their farm... She had asked around town, finding out his name was Roland, yet she was still far too shy to introduce herself to him. Yet that didn't stop her from sneaking out at night to peek into his window while he...

THUNK!

"Muuooo...." She grunted, shaking her head and wondering why the hell it hurt so much. Then as the stars faded from her vision, she saw the tree right in front of her, "Whoops... heheh, must not of been payin' attention again!"

"Are you alright there? Looks like you hit your head pretty hard..."

"Eep!" She gasped in surprise, turning her head to look behind her and seeing the wolf boy standing there smiling and holding a stack of books on archaeology.

Caught off guard, Sally pushed her shirt down past her overalls, exposing a fair bit of cleavage and thrusting out her bosom in an sloppy attempt to look more... appealing. "Oh, I'm fine..." she cooed in a sultry voice as she turned toward him, "Just carrying these heavy buckets back to my little abode..."

Roland didn't seem too seduced though, as he simply looked off to the side a little and snickered, "Need any... err... help miss?"

Sally, quite offended, snorted, trying to act gruff in order to distract him... or herself... from the fact that her furred cheeks had turned a bright red, "I think I can handle myself, thank you.... Now why don'tchya run along back to your little home puppy? Looks like you've got quite a bit of studying to do..."

She snorted again, turning abruptly away from him as she stuck her snout into the air and continued on her way down the road, leaving the wolf boy to blush this time, confused and somewhat embarrassed by his neighbor's odd behavior...

"By the gods, between this and having to put up with her peeping tom habits..." He mumbled to himself before marching on to do what he was doing before.

As she continued on, the young, flirtatious cowgirl was started to get tired. Between carrying around this huge weight on her back, and getting all hot and bothered from meeting with her hunky neighbor, she was really starting to sweat.... The strange plant let out a piercing shriek that echoed around the cave. The vine in her mouth yanked itself out and the vines holding her arms and legs dropped her to the floor of the cave. The vines pulled back inside the huge flower then the petals of the flower closed protectively.

Sally didn't want to wait for the plant to recover so she got to her hoofed feet and ran out of the cave. As soon as she was out of the cave she examined herself. Thankfully she had gotten away before the stuff that the plant was pumping into her stomach could cause her to gain more than a few pounds. Her breasts and udder definitely looked bigger, but the rest of her body had gained so little that barely noticeable. In fact she wouldn't have noticed at all if it wasn't for the fact that her clothes felt a tiny bit tighter than before. The cowgirl shivered at the horrible memory of what just happened. Despite the small change, the experience still horrified her. She has always worked extra hard on the farm in order to keep a slim figure.

She forced herself to put it out of her mind as she took a look around. That was when she realized that she had no idea where she was. That plant had dragged her so far through the forest that she was now completely lost! After thinking for a few minutes, Sally picked a random direction and started walking. She just had to hope that she would get lucky and find someone to guide her out of the forest. It wasn't much of a plan, but it was the only one she could think of.

Sally walked for about 15 minutes before she saw something through some trees far in front of her. It was hard to see what it was, because of all the trees. She squinted her eyes for a moment before she realized what she was looking at. It was a castle! Feeling excited, Sally ran towards it. When she arrived she realized that the castle was very large and it looked very old. There was a small moat surrounding it, but thankfully the drawbridge was down. Something about the water in the moat looked strange but she couldn't figure out what so she put it out of her mind.

"Odd, I don't remember ever hearing about a castle in this forest." Sally muttered to herself before she shrugged, "Well, maybe there is someone inside who can help me get home."
1553311111.title: A Cowgirl Lost in the Forest

choices: She goes into the castle's keep
She goes to search the castle's stable and barn
15533111111.content:
Sally walked across the drawbridge as her hooves made loud clomping noises on the wooden planks. She crossed through the main gate of the castle and stepped into the courtyard. The moment she did the drawbridge raised trapping her inside the castle. Feeling slightly disturbed by this, she bit her lip lightly as she looked around.

The courtyard had a few flower beds in it and the castle's stable and barn was off to one side. On the other side of the courtyard from Sally was the castle's keep. The keep was very large and seemed almost foreboding and ominous. Something seemed off about this whole castle. A castle is usually full of servants like maids or butlers that are always running around doing chores. However, Sally didn't see anyone.

"Hello?" She called out hoping to get a response.

When no response came she realized that she would have to search this place to find someone. She could go straight to the castle's keep and start searching there or she could go look in the castle's stable and barn first.
15533111111.title: Sally crosses the drawbridge and enters the castle

choices: Sally enters the stall to investigate the noise
Must have been the wind. She goes to take another look at the equipment
155331111112.content:
Sally decided that she might as well search the stable. She looked the building over as she approached it. The stable was made out of wood and the sides were painted red. In short, it looked completely ordinary. She reached the building a moment later and opened the stable's large wooden door. She stepped inside, then closed the door behind her.

"Anyone here?" She asked.

When there was no response she decided to look around a little. She saw rows of stalls lining the inside of the stable. The stall walls were high enough to keep her from seeing inside them. She also saw various pieces of equipment that are used to care for horses and cows. There are some feedbags and saddles for horses and some cowbells for cows. Something looked odd about the equipment however. Before she could take a closer look at the equipment she heard a sound coming from one of the nearby stalls.

"Hello?" Sally called out. Once again there was no response.
155331111112.title: Searching the Stable

choices: Sally touches one of the feedbags
Sally touches one of the cowbells
1553311111122.content:
"Must have been the wind." Sally remarked to herself before she turned her attention back to the equipment.

There were several horse feedbags and cowbells on a nearby table. The feedbags were filled with grain and oats and the cowbells were attached to leather straps meant to go around a cow's neck. The feedbags had fancy symbols and images stitched into them. The cowbells also had symbols and images etched into them. The feedbags were made of a rich dark leather and the cowbells looked like they were made of gold!

The owner of this castle must be very wealthy to buy such expensive items just for cows and horses. Sally thought to herself. But she couldn't identify the strange symbols on the feedbags and cowbells.
1553311111122.title: Sally Examines the Equipment

choices: Sally runs into the castle's keep and slams the door behind her
Sally runs into the castle's dungeon and slams the door behind her
15533111111221.content:
Feeling curious, Sally leaned forward and closely examined one of the feedbags. The designs stitched into the feedbag looked quite ornate. Sally felt a small tinge of jealousy as she silently wished that she had equipment this expensive on her farm. She knew that would never happen, but she could at least admire such a fine piece of craftsmanship. After looking at the feedbag for a few moments she reached out and lightly touched it.

The second Sally touched the feedbag it appeared to take on a life of its own. The leather straps on the feedbag moved like legs as they pressed against the table. The leather straps launched the feedbag into the air and towards Sally! She barely had time to gasp before the feedbag hit her. The leather straps wrapped around her head and the feedbag was jammed against her face!

"MRRFFF!" Sally's startled scream was muffled by the feedbag on her face as she desperately struggled to pry the leather straps off.

That was when the poor cowgirl lost control of her mouth. Her mouth startled chewing and slurping down the oats and grain in the feedbag at a furious pace. Her mouth kept gulping down the horse food despite the bland and disgusting taste. No matter how hard Sally tried she couldn't get her mouth to stop. Sally's belly began to feel full and her shirt rode up a little as her tummy bulged a small amount. Thankfully the feedbag was soon empty. The leather straps that were holding the feedbag to her face suddenly loosened on their own and the feedbag dropped to the stable floor. As soon as the feedbag was off Sally regained control of her mouth.

"Does everything want to stuff me today?!" The cowgirl yelled as she quickly scrambled away from the feedbag on the floor. She didn't want to stick around in case it decided to do anything else to her so she ran out of the stable and closed the wooden door behind her.

Sally stood in the courtyard catching her breath as she examined herself. First that bizarre plant had made her gain a few pounds and now that force feeding feedbag had done the same thing. Her stomach now had a small yet noticeable bulge and her entire body felt slightly heavier all over. Thankfully, the damage to her figure looked minimal. She could still... technically... be called thin, her body was just a little... chunky in places. She got a lot of exercise working on a farm so she could probably get back in shape after a month or so. The real question that disturbed her was how she was gaining weight so quickly. It shouldn't be possible to gain so much weight in such a short amount of time, no matter how much food a person eats! It was almost as if any food that entered her stomach was being digested and turned into fat at a furious pace. She knew It didn't happen instantly though, because her stomach had felt full for a few minutes after being forced to eat that grain.

It was obvious to her that something magical was going on. The cave with that strange plant in it wasn't too far from this castle so these places were probably connected somehow. She knew that she should get out of here; unfortunately, the drawbridge had raised after she crossed it so she was trapped in this castle. It looked like she had no choice but to keep on exploring this strange place. She just had to hope that she could find someone here that could help her escape and get home. Sally knew that she wasn't an adventurer. All she wanted was to get out of here.

Sally looked at the main doors to the castle's keep as she prepared to go inside, but then she saw another door nearby. She must have overlooked it the first time she looked around the courtyard. That wasn't too surprising considering that the doors were against the ground. It must lead into the castle's dungeon. Sally isn't sure if she should head into the castle's keep or the castle's dungeon.

Before she could make up her mind she heard the sound of the stable doors opening. The cowgirl turned around and gasped when she saw the feedbag from before pull itself out of the stable and into the courtyard. She was on the other side of the courtyard, but even from there she could see that the feedbag was once again full of grain and oats. It must have refilled itself from a supply in the stable somewhere! Despite its lack of any eyes the living feedbag must have seen her as well, because it began to move towards her. The feedbag was quickly pulling itself along the ground with its leather straps in a way that looked very bizarre.

Sally didn't want a second helping of oats and grain so she quickly made up her mind.
15533111111221.title: Sally Gets Her Daily Fiber

choices: Sally takes a look at the doors
Sally takes a closer look at the paintings and statues
155331111112211.content:
Sally pumped her hooves hard against the ground as she made a frantic dash for the doors of the castle's keep. Her hooves clomped loudly on the courtyard's cobblestone path as she got closer and closer to the door. She spared a second to cast a quick glance over her shoulder and saw that the living feedbag was chasing her. Despite the bag's small size and strange method of moving it was slowly gaining on her! For a moment, Sally wasn't sure if she would reach the door in time, but an extra burst of speed caused by adrenaline helped her out.

The cowgirl reached the door and after quickly grabbing the handle she yanked the door open. Sally darted inside, then pulled the door shut behind her. She made it just in time, because a moment later she heard the feedbag hit the door. She could hear the sound of the feedbag's leather straps scratching at the other side of the door like an animal trying to get in. Sally leaned against a nearby wall as she struggled to catch her breath. A minute or so later she realized that she couldn't hear the sound of the feedbag scratching at the other side of the door anymore. She put one ear against the door and still didn't hear anything.

"It must be gone." Sally said aloud to reassure herself and calm her nerves.

She gripped the doorknob and opened the door a little, then stuck her head outside to take a peek. It didn't take her long to realize the stupidity of her mistake, because the second her head peeked out the feedbag lunged at her.

"Oh shi... MRRFF!" Sally was interrupted as the feedbag latched itself onto her face with its leather straps.

The poor cowgirl once again lost control of her mouth as it started chewing and slurping down the grain and oats inside the feedbag. The horse food tasted no better than it did the first time. Pulling on the straps holding the feedbag to her face still proved useless. After a few minutes, the feedbag was empty and it released her just like before. The feedbag then skittered away back towards the stable. It was doubtlessly going back to refilling itself with more oats and grain. Sally obviously didn't want to wait for it to return so she pulled her head back inside the castle's keep and closed the door. She had gained a few more pounds just like last time. Her clothes were starting to feel tight around her chest and butt. She knew she couldn't let herself dwell on it, because she could start panicking so she put it out of her mind and focused on her surroundings instead.

She was standing in what looked like the main entrance hall. There were several doors nearby as well as some strange paintings on the walls and a few odd statues on top of large ornate pedestals.
155331111112211.title: Sally runs into the castle's keep

choices: Sally takes a closer look at the painting without fat people in it
Sally takes a closer look at the largest statue in the center of the room
1553311111122112.content:
Almost all of the paintings have an obese person in it. Some paintings show groups of fat people gorging at tables full of food. Other paintings feature a single fat person lounging around. One painting for example, shows what looks like a 600 pound female elf relaxing on a sofa. Another painting shows the face and neck of a lizard woman who had five chins and extremely flabby cheeks. One painting that stood out from the rest caught her attention, because it didn't have any fat people in it.

Each of the statues are of an obese person. Each statue looked like it was carved from fine marble and each one was on top of an ornate pedestal. The statues were tastefully arranged around the entrance hall. One statue stood out from the rest, because it was in the center of the hall and it was much larger than the other statues.

"Whoever made these must have very odd tastes." Sally remarked aloud to herself.

Something about the painting without fat people in it and the largest statue in the room piqued her curiosity. She felt the urge to examine one of them more closely.
1553311111122112.title: Everyone's A Critic

choices: Sally breaks free of the enchantment and escapes with what's left of her figure.
Sally shrugs it off and digs into the steaks.
15533111111221121.content:
Sally decided to get a closer look at the lone "normal" painting out of the collection that hung upon the walls. She walked over to it carefully, unsure she should quite trust anything not to go wrong today. Upon examination, she found the painting to be a still life of a feast-laden table, rather exquisitely done, in fact. It was almost, she thought, like looking in a window… like you could just… reach out and touch that delicious, delicious food…

Sally, perhaps not fully in control of herself by this time, slowly raised her hand and touched it lightly to the painting. The world suddenly swirled and spun, and she closed her eyes to steady herself. When she opened them again, she was no longer in the castle… but nor was she yet free.

"By the gods…!" she gasped, nearly breathless, "This looks like the painting!"

Indeed, before Sally lay the extravagant feast so exactingly rendered in the painting she had been looking at just a moment ago. But, if the smells that hung heavy in the air were anything to judge by, it was as real as she was. In fact, she might have been inclined to believe she had just stepped through a door into another room were it not for the fact that… the fact that…

Sally shook her head, brow furrowing. "What painting? There's no paintings in here… Just all this food! Good thing, too; I'm starving!"

Rubbing her roaring stomach, unmindful of the way it squished slightly under her hand, Sally moved forward to the feast. She spotted a particularly scrumptious-looking slice of cake and bit into it. Moist and flavorful as she had never experienced before, it was easily the best cake she had ever tasted…

'I thought nothing could beat my cooking, but it seems I was wrong!' Sally thought happily, moving further down the table while munching on another few slices of cakes.

Pies, cookies and brownies disappeared one by one, but not quite into her stomach. Instead, as she ate, Sally was slowly swelling outwards underneath her overalls. She felt simultaneously stuffed full and completely unsatisfied. Her belly began to take on a stuffed look, remaining round as it grew to press against her overalls.

Her hips were not excepted, straining the stitching on the sides below as her rump rounded out behind her. Even her bust grew more, lifting up the shirt she wore beneath her overalls and putting more pressure on the already-stressed straps holding it together. Sally had grown to the size of many of the doughy housewives her age she had so desired to avoid imitating, a soft and weakened shade of her former self.

Sally suddenly paused with her hand perched over a plate of rather perfect-looking steaks. Eating the feral members of her own half-species wasn't something she generally did. It felt too close to cannibalism…

And yet she was so hungry! Her stomach was roaring fit to frighten a dragon, and those steaks could very well be the only things to satiate her…

Sally swallowed hard, closing her eyes as her head swam with all manner of confused thoughts…
15533111111221121.title: Painted Into A Corner!

choices: Sally goes up the stairs
Sally goes down one of the hallways
155331111112211211.content:
Sally's willpower struggled against her hungry tummy as it growled in demand for the steaks. The steaks looked so delicious... what harm could it do to eat one? Sally slowly reached out and picked up one of the steaks. She brought it up to her mouth and opened wide to take a bite.

Before she could bite down, a mental image flashed through her mind. She saw a painting of herself hanging on the wall of the castle. But in the painting she was incredibly obese to the point of immobility. Her painting looked just like the paintings of all the other obese people in the hall. She had a strange feeling that that would be her fate.

"No!" Sally shouted as the mental image shocked her back to her senses. She tossed the steak away from herself and it hit the wall with a disgusting splat.

A moment later the room was filled with a bright and overwhelming light. Sally squinted her eyes shut reflexively as the light became unbearable. As soon as she closed her eyes, she felt herself being flung through the air. The air was knocked out of her when she landed on a hard stone floor. After she regained her breath she opened her eyes and stood up.

She was back in the castle where she was before she touched the painting! The cowgirl looked over to where the painting was and saw nothing except an empty picture frame hanging on the wall. Resisting whatever mental enchantment the painting had put on her had somehow caused her to be ejected from the painting which was destroyed in the process.

"That was a close one. Thank goodness I escape unhar..." Sally's voice trailed off as she looked down at her body.

She still had all the fat her body gained when she was in the painting! Her slim figure was officially ruined! She now had a small pot belly and her body jiggled a little all over. Her clothes still fit, but they were feeling quite snug in places. Thankfully, she couldn't quite be called overweight let alone obese. But if she didn't escape this place, she knew that would change.

"How could things get any worse?" Sally sobbed as she looked at her ruined figure.

As if in answer to that question, the living feedbag from earlier skittered out of the shadows on its leather straps. It had once again refilled itself with more grain and oats from the stable and had come back after her. The front door was still closed so it must have found another way into the castle.

"Damn it, that question was rhetorical!" Sally shouted at the feedbag as it ran towards her.

Once it was close enough, the feedbag pushed off of the ground with its straps and leaped through the air towards her face. Sally almost dodged it... almost. The blasted thing smacked into her face and immediately latched on with its leather straps. Just like the two previous times, Sally lost control of her mouth and started gulping down the oats and grain.

Several minutes later, Sally swallowed down the last of the grain. The feedbag detached itself from her face and skittered off into the shadows. It was doubtlessly going back to the stables for more oats and grain.

"Just leave me alone already!" Sally shouted at the feedbag as it disappeared from sight. Thankfully the feedbag only causes her to gain 3 or 4 pounds each time it attacks her, but raw grain and oats taste terrible!

She knew she should get out of this part of the castle before it showed up again. There was an ornate staircase leading up to the next floor as well as several hallways connected to the entrance hall.
155331111112211211.title: Things can ALWAYS get Worse

choices: Sally investigates the sound
Sally's too tired to investigate. She rolls over and goes back to sleep.
1553311111122112111.content:
Sally's hooves clomped loudly on the marble steps as she went up the stairs. The stairway was quite ornate with a small curve at the bottom and a fancy rail on one side with a wall on the other. There were more paintings of obese people on the wall of the stairs, but Sally was careful to stay far away from them, she didn't want to risk being sucked into another painting after all.

She couldn't help but wonder though if all the obese people in the paintings are actually real people that got trapped in the paintings like she almost was. Sally stared at an obese person in one of the paintings and saw the eyes move! The people in all of these paintings are definitely real people! For a moment she wondered if she should try to rescue them, but then she saw one of the paintings that had several obese people in it gorging themselves on a large feast. That was probably what happened when more than one person touched one of these paintings. One person would get pulled into a painting, then their friends would try to rescue them only to get pulled into the painting to. After that, none of them would be able to resist the delicious food and they would all end up being trapped in one painting. There wasn't anything that Sally could do to help them.

The cowgirl looked away from the paintings and continued to climb the stairs. She still wasn't used to the added weight on her figure so she was out of breath when she reached the top. She looked out a window at the top of the stairs and saw that the sun had set quite a while ago. Sally opened her mouth and let out a wide yawn. This day had been a nightmare for her and she felt exhausted. She looked around her and saw several doors. She opened the nearest one and saw that there was a guest bedroom inside with an ornate king sized bed.

"I'll worry about getting out of this place tomorrow, after I get some sleep." Sally muttered to herself as she collapsed on the bed. She was asleep in only a few minutes.

...

Some time later, Sally woke up. She glanced out a nearby window and saw that it was still nighttime. She began to wonder why she had woken up before morning when she heard something. It sounded like something was moving beneath the bed.
1553311111122112111.title: Up The Stairs

choices: Sally makes a break for it!
Just lockdown the room for now and get some rest...
15533111111221121111.content:
Part of her told the cow girl not to dare look, but still she had to figure out what that noise was... It could even be another trap to get her fatter (Last thing she needed was more weight put on her frame).

So slowly, Sally crept over to the side of the bed, her more enhanced bosom jiggling at the slight movement and her wider behind wiggling greatly. When she reached the end of the bed, the cow girl slowly lowered her head towards the floor, her hair falling slightly.

Through the covers, Sally was met with nothing under the bed except darkness. As she turned her head to the right - Nothing.

To her left - Nothing still.

"Well," Sally sighed as she used all her strength to get back on the bed. "That's a relief..."

That's when something poked Sally's meatier behind, making her jump slightly as she turned around to be met with a familiar item...

The feedbag!

"Oh cra..."

Sally didn't get a chance to finish, the feedbag had leapt and strapped itself to her face, making her jaw perform the same forced chewing to eat the oats inside it.

A few minutes later, the feedbag was empty and crawling away from the slightly bigger cowgirl. "It... It felt like the amount of oats increased..."

No doubt about it, if that feedbag kept coming back, it wouldn't matter if she avoided those paintings or other cursed items. That feedbag would eventually feed her into a permanent fixture into the castle.
15533111111221121111.title: Sally investigates the sound

choices: Sally is not a morning person. She needs coffee. NOW!
Sally continues to explore the castle
155331111112211211112.content:
Sally was still too tired to continue her exploration of the castle so she simply locked the door. Her hooves clomped on the floor as she walked back over to the bed with her cow-like tail flowing behind her. She grumbled to herself in irritation at having been woken up as she climbed back into bed. A few minutes later she was fast asleep.

...

Sally woke up the next day and to her surprise she discovered that she was tied to the bed! As she struggled feebly against the bonds she realized that there was something wedged in her mouth that was keeping it from closing. Sally looked at the strange object and saw that it was a large clear tube with a thick and yellow liquid oozing through. The liquid was oozing into her mouth and she was swallowing it instinctively to avoid choking. She looked at the other end of the tube and saw that it was connected to the bottom of a large tank with the words "Pure Lard" on it.

Where did that come from?! Sally wondered to herself silently as the feeding tube kept her from saying it aloud. She was sure that the tank wasn't there before she went to sleep. How could someone get it into the room without waking her up? Just how long had this tank been filling her tummy with lard?

Sally looked down and what she saw would have made her scream if she wasn't gagged by the feeding tube. The feeding tube must have been filling her with lard all night, because her body was now a bloated blob of jiggling fat. She was so big that the restraints keeping her tied to the bed weren't really necessary anymore, because she was now completely immobile with fat.

...

"Noooo!" Sally gasped as she sat up in bed. She looked around in confusion for a moment until she realized that it was just a nightmare.

"Thank goodness it was just a nightmare." Sally sighed with relief. She was still in the bed in the castle, but she wasn't tied down or immobile with fat, but she still had all the fat she had gained in this place before she went to sleep. She looked out the window and saw that it was now morning.
155331111112211211112.title: Bad Dreams

choices: Sally approaches the cat girl and politely asks if she can have some coffee
Sally grabs the E labeled coffee pot and sneaks away unnoticed
1553311111122112111121.content:
After the fear caused by the nightmare had passed Sally felt drowsy and sleepy again. She felt like she could fall back asleep at any moment. She never was a morning person, but since she still wasn't used to all the weight her body had gained yesterday she felt even more tired than she usually did in the morning. Her fur was wild and ruffled from her night in bed. Her eyes were crusty with dark bags under them.

"Coffee..." Sally groaned as she unlocked the bedroom door and stepped out into the hall.

Sally always had trouble remembering anything that happens to her in the morning before she has any coffee, but luckily she was very good at finding it. She raised her nose in the air and sniffed a few times until she caught the tantalizing scent of coffee. She began to follow the smell like a bloodhound. She followed the aroma back down the stairs that she had gone up last night. Then she started to follow the smell down one of the hallways.

"Coffee..." She groaned again sounding like a zombie moaning for fresh brains.

The living feedbag came into view as it skittered around the corner at the end of the hallway she was walking down. It immediately started moving towards her with the obvious intent of making her eat more grain.

Sally glared at it with her bloodshot eyes and growled, "Not... now."

The feedbag stopped in its tracks so fast it almost left skid marks on the floor with its leather straps. It seemed to shake with fear as it hesitated for a few moments. Evidently it decided that it should come back later, because it skittered back in the direction that it came from and disappeared around the corner.

"Coffee..." Sally continued to moan until she reached the source of the smell.

The cow girl entered the room that the aroma was coming from and discovered that it was the castle's kitchen. There was a cat girl standing in front of a counter chopping vegetables. Her back was to the door so she didn't see Sally enter. The cat girl was the first person that Sally had seen since she had entered this castle. The cat girl was very obese which wasn't very surprising considering everything that this castle had been doing to Sally. What was more surprising was that the cat girl was completely naked except for a chefs hat on her head. The cat girl's belly, thighs, and butt were so big that she waddled around ridiculously as she walked. The woman looked like she was only 70 or so pounds away from complete immobility.

Sally looked around the kitchen until she spotted two coffee pots on a counter. One coffee pot had the letter R on the side that must have stood for regular. The other coffee pot had the letter E on the side. E must mean espresso, Sally reasoned. That was just what she needed to wake up!
1553311111122112111121.title: Cow Lick Bed Hair

Move in and get agusted for now...
15533111111221121111211.content:
"Um excuse me, I'm sorry to bother you and all but I was wondering if I could have a cup of coffee please?" Sally said nervously after approaching the obese cat girl.

The cat girl turned arround to face Sally and smilled. "Why of course dear, its been a while since we've had some new people in here R or E?" She said as she waddled over to the coffee pots.

"E....please, I'm really tired right now and I could use a boost" Sally said softly right before yawning agian.

The cat girl chuckled as she poured Sally a cup of coffee "Here ya go." Sally thanked her and quickly downed the cofee, it tasted fantastic and woke her up immeaditly.....it also had a seperate side effect. Sally's body bloated out with fat her belly, thighs and butt swelled up and strained her pants and shirt.

"Well haven't you noticed yet dear? Everything in this place makes you fatter, the only things that don't are the water and the R coffee, that means Regular, the one you asked for E, is for expansion." The cat girl said with a light chuckle.

"Its not funny, you should have told me! I'm just trying to get out of here." Sally exlaimmed feeling her fatter belly.

The cat girl suddenly stopped laughing and had a sad look on her face, "Oh I'm sorry I thought you knew. I wasn't trying to be mean or anything. Also a littlle bit of information, your not gonna get out of here I'm sorry but that's the truth. You might as learn to like it here, its really not that bad after you get used to the place. I've been here for about a year now, its only the resisters th at have a unforturente fate. The rest of us are quite happy here and we enjoy our company. By the way my names Nora nice to meet you." the cat girl said reaching out her hand to shake Sally's.

"Nice to meet you Nora, my name's Sally." Sally said shaking Nora's hand and said, "So now what can I do?"

the left one with something you decide in there.

She took a right and started walking down the hall carefully, she prayed silently that the feed bag would not come back though she knew it would. The halls were silent, making here think it was a good idea to leave that kitchen quickly as she did, the Nora was probably lying about people living here happily. "Tell me about yourself, the enchanter can wait for now."
155331111112211211112112.content:
Sally pondered on Nora's words, thinking the situation over. "So, if I submit to whoever, or whatever owns this place, I get left alone?"

The obese cat girl nodded, smiling brightly, "For the most part yes, so are you going to join?" She asks, her eyes glistening adorably.

Sighing, the cow-girl nodded, "Alright, I'll join you guys, for now, as soon as I find a way out of here though I'm out of he-"

Before she can finish her sentence she is cut off by a loud squeal of delight followed by a crushing hug, the cat-girls tremendous belly smothering the comparatively tiny cow-girl, "I knew you would! This is great! It's always nice to have another person among our group!" Nora said gleefully, noticing the agitated and yet rather pleasant shifting coming from her belly, the cat-girl pulled away from the hug, blushing. "Oh, sorry about that, I can get a bit carried away some times, heh heh, heh... Sorry."

Rubbing her face to regain her senses (and cover up her blush), Sarah shook her head, "It's fine, I know some people like that, so uh, what now then?"

Smiling, Nora went to one of the kitchen counters and pulled open a draw, then closing it after pulling out a tiny object, she walked back to Sally, opening her pudgy paw to reveal a golden ring, "Just put this ring on, and you'll be magically connected to the castle, meaning that it will look after you and make sure you're all good and stuff."

Raising an eyebrow, the cow-girl took the ring, examining it, aside from the odd markings around the outside, it just looked like an ordinary gold ring, then again considering the nature of this place, she knew looks could be very deceiving. Shrugging, she slipped the ring onto one of her fingers, finding it fit surprisingly well. "Huh, is that all? That isn't so ba-UUUURRRPP!!" eyes widening in surprise, sally's hands went to her belly, which was gurgling and growling like mad and realising a ton of gas, and they widened even wider when she felt the damn thing growing again! Straining against her already tight clothing. "What's URP happening to URP, me!?" She cried, looking at Nora as she felt her butt straining against the backside of her overalls.

The cat-girl looked at her apologetically, "I'm sorry, but pretty much everyone who works and lives here has to be obese, masters orders."

Before she could retort, Sally let out another loud belch, taking a step back as her body swelled bigger and bigger, while she would have been somewhat glad to know that her clothes seemed to be growing with her, at the moment she was too panicked to care, belching more and more as she got bigger and bigger. After what felt like ages to the cow-girl (but was only a couple minutes in reality), the swelling stopped, leaving her far larger than before. Letting out one last belch, she began to moan, rubbing the massive glob of fat that was her belly. "I'm, I'm huge."

Nora walked up to her and started rubbing too, causing Sally to coo, "I know, probably a quarter ton by the looks of things, fitting for your species I must say," The annoyed glance sent her way did nothing to change her opinion, "What? It's true, cows tend to be pretty huge."

"Whatever," Sally sighed, appreciating the rubs too much to really complain, even though she wasn't really full, the feeling was still amazing to her.

Nora looked at her new fellow resident, looking as though in thought, "You know, I think there might be someone who could help you escape," at the half inquisitive look she received, the cat-girl continued, "The rings protect and nurture us, but they also keep us here, keep us from running away or resisting, and always keeping us fat, but I've heard a rumour about how a co-creator of the rings, an elven enchanter who also lives here has found a way to make the rings loyal to the wearer and the wearer alone. But as I said, it's just a rumour really..."

Looking at the cat-girl, Sally spoke up, "This is probably the ring talking a bit, but let's get something to eat and a place to sit down, then..."
155331111112211211112112.title: Staying for a little while can't hurt too much...

15533111111221121111212.content:
Sally wasn't so sure if she should approach the cat girl. Everything else she had encountered in this castle wanted nothing more than to fatten her up. She wouldn't be surprised if this cat girl would try to do the same thing. So it was best for her to stay hidden.

The cow girl sneaked over to the counter with the two coffee pots on it. The cat girl's back was still turned so it was easy for Sally to reach the coffee pots unnoticed. She carefully lifted up the coffee pot with the letter E on it, then tip toed back to the door. She went back into the hallway with the coffee pot in her hand.

"Finally, some coffee." Sally muttered to herself.

She took a sip straight from the pot. The coffee was at the perfect temperature and tasted wonderful. She took another sip and then another until before she knew it the coffee pot was empty.

"Ah..." Sally sighed as her drowsiness faded away, "Now to keep looking for a way out of this castle. Woah!"

As Sally went to take a step her balance was thrown off by a strange weight in her belly. She stumbled and fell to the floor of the hallway. She looked down at her belly and was surprised to see that her belly was bulging out ridiculously. The strange thing was that her belly didn't look like it had gotten fatter so Sally wasn't quite sure what was happening. But then she heard the loud sloshing sounds coming from inside her tummy and she finally realized what was going ton. Her stomach was bloated with coffee and had to have been holding several gallons of it.

"What the?" Sally exclaimed, "I didn't drink that much! There wasn't even that much in the coffee pot!"

Her stomach suddenly began to swell up even more as the amount of coffee in her belly continued to increase at a steady rate.

"No! No! No!" Sally wailed as she struggled to stand up. Unfortunately her swelling belly was constantly messing up her sense of balance so each time she got to her feet she ended up falling to the ground again.

In no time at all, Sally looked like she had a large beach ball under her shirt and it was still getting larger. The coffee in her continued to make loud sloshing noises every time she moved. She kept swelling larger and larger and her clothes started to rip. In only a few minutes her clothes were in shreds. She was completely naked with a belly that had enough coffee in it to fill a bathtub.

As she continued to swell up she kept standing up and falling to the ground. But after several more minutes she could no longer stand up... because her feet couldn't reach the ground. Her belly had grown so big that it reached the floor and had pushed the rest of her body up enough that her feet couldn't reach the floor. She was now completely helpless, but her ordeal wasn't over yet because her belly was still getting larger.

Ten minutes later, Sally's whole body was practically spherical. Her hands, feet, head, and breasts were the only things that were visible on her huge round body. Her belly continued to swell until Sally was sure that she was about to pop like an overfilled water balloon, then the swelling stopped.

...

The next day, the cat girl was in the kitchen filling her coffee cup. She took a sip, then frowned and said, "Needs sugar."

She emptied her cup of coffee into the kitchen sink. She returned then shoved several spoons full of sugar into Sally's mouth, forcing her to swallow each one. The cat girl grabbed one of Sally's breasts and tugged on one of the tits. Fresh hot coffee poured from the nipple, refilling the coffee cup.

Sally let out a faint whimper. Whimpering was all that she could do now, because her body was too bloated to speak.

"Hush now!" The cat girl scolds her, "The Lipomancer declared that you are to be the castle's only source of coffee. I know it's not fair, but if I defy the Lipomancer I could end up becoming the castle's second source of coffee."

Sally whimpered again as the cat girl left. She wondered how things could possibly get any worse for her. The question was soon answered when the living feedbag entered the room then latched onto her face.

1553311111122112111122.content:
As Sally got up, saw a mirror hanging on the wall of the bedroom. Looking at it from the bed, her reflection looks like one of those women that try to make themselves look thinner by wearing clothes two sizes too small. Unfortunately for her, this didn't help hide her figure in the slightest. She wasn't exactly wearing a corset or girdle or anything, and her clothes were now so tight that you could see that her now bigger boobs were straining her shirt, even beneath her overalls. Said overalls were pretty stretched as well, so much so that the "V" shape in the back partially exposed the tight panties on her fleshy rear. Looking in the nearby cabinets, she found only clothes that would fit much larger women. Looking at her tight-fitting clothes, Sally decided to keep them on, holding onto the hope that she can become the way she used to look.

When sally opened the heavy wooden door, she saw that there was nothing in the hall while stepping outside with her chubby legs. Sally walked down the hall, seeing many types of art featuring all kinds of fat women and a few men as she did so. Sighing Sally stares at one of the paintings of a woman so obese that you could not even see her arms or legs in the picture frame.

"I hope I get out of here before I end up like her!" She whimpered, looking over the morbidly obese woman's painted face while she rubbed her dome of a belly.

As Sally rubs her stomach, she noticed that her belly button is starting to peek out, enough so that she could feel it beneath the fabric of her overalls. Moving her paws to her sides, she also realized, with no small amount of shame, that she had acquired a prominent set of love handles over the course of her stay at the castle. In fact, they had grown so big that they pushed up her shirt and sagged out the side of her overalls, forming clearly visible fleshy roll like a muffin top. Trying to save some of her dignity she pulled the shirt down.

A little while later Sally found an old staircase made of clearly rotting wood that lead up to another floor in the keep. As Sally was climbing the staircase she could hear the wooden planks creaking under her considerable weight. Sally then heard the familiar sound of the feedbag and, looking behind her, she saw that the feedbag had brought along another feedbag! But this feedbag seemed to be filled with some kind of yellowish liquid that oozed out as it came toward Sally.

"Looks like that dream was a vision of what was coming," Said Sally as she realized that the new feedbag was filled with liquid lard.

Thankfully the feedbags were a bit away so Sally tried to climb up the staircase at a faster pace when...

15533111111221121111221.content:
The cowgirl was just starting up the treacherously creaking steps when she was suddenly struck with an idea. Sally stopped climbing the stairs and turned back to look at the pursuing feedbags and, when she had determined that they were far enough away, she put her plan into motion. She lifted her bare, rock-hard hoof up into the air, grasping the banister for balance, before bringing it straight down into the dead center of the first wooden step of the staircase.

CRACK!

The step gave way with barely any resistance beneath the combined might of her bovine hoof and the weight of her tubby body. Even though she nearly lost her balance, saved only by the presence of the hand railing from a messy tumble, a triumphant grin spread across the blonde farmgirl's lip while her eyes sparkled with gleeful hope.

"Guess being a big girl has some advantages! Now I just need to get the rest of these..." She murmured as she moved up to the next step.

She continued to do the same for the next several steps up the staircase, making certain that the planks were completely cleared away. By the time the feedbag carrying the oats had reached the bottom of the stairs, they were completely destroyed.

CRASH!

The wooden splinters of yet another step fell to the floor below and clattered loudly, echoing throughout the silent hall of the castle. The feedbag tilted back, as if to look at the cowgirl with the front of its body. Oats spilling off the top of the overstuffed foodsack while it shook in what Sally could only interpret as anger, low grumbling noises voicing the animated accessory's frustration. It was a little disturbing, but it only served to bring another smile to Sally's face as she caught her breath from her improvised renovations. She was finally rid of this damn thing, at least until it found another flight of stairs, but she had finally denied the damnable menace its purpose, her first victory against the feedbag! That alone was enough to give Sally a great deal of smug satisfaction.

"Oh haha!" She screamed in elation, leaning back against the wall next to her and giggling almost uncontrollably, "You don't like that, do ya, you miserable little sack! I'll give you this though: You're sure as hell are determined, aint ya? You just want to fucking stuff me, and force those bloody damn oats down my face, well I'm sick of 'em! I've eaten them for the last time, you hear?!"

The cowgirl turned about, sticking her nose in the air like a prude before shaking her pudgy rump at the twitching feedbag teasingly and continuing to climb up the steps, "So you take that abominable shit and get out of here, cause I'm done stomaching tha-"

Creeeeeeeaaaaak... CRACK!

Before she had any hope of reacting, the step in front of her gave way under her weight! The bovine lass clung desperately to the banister as her chubby leg hung over open air. The feedbag, which had gone from throes of anger to drooping forlornly, now shot up to attention as if ecstatic, lurching and hopping to the floor directly beneath the hanging cowgirl.

"Meep..." Sally whimpered as she looked below her at the anxious bag of oats, now hopping into the air towards her, straps mere inches from brushing her hoof, "Seems my noble knight is here to catch his precious damsel..." She grumbled.

Unwilling to let herself fall into the waiting grip of the cursed feedbag once more, Sally tried to free her leg from the collapsed stairs, but as she was pulling it loose from the hole she had made, she heard yet another dreadful creak as the railing she was depending on started to bend.

"Oh no, please don't..." She gasped, breathless as she squeezed her eyes shut, "Please no, please no, pleeeeeaaase....!"

Snap!

The overweight cowgirl came crashing down, her hefty hips and bulky body smashing through a couple more stairs before she was falling through air and, shortly after, landing with a rumbling thud against the floor of the hallway. A forced grunt escaped Sally's lips as the wind was knocked out of her lungs, and as she lay on the cold, stone ground, gasping for air, she heard the familiar sound of the feedbag's metal buckles clacking against the tiles, right next to her head.

"Okay... I know I said... huff... a lot of rude... mean things... but if you could just"

The young bovine didn't have the chance to finish as the straps of the feedbag whipped through the air and wrapped around her head, screwing itself yet again onto her snout and cramming its bland, filling contents into her chomping maw...

It took a bit longer than previous feedings, several minutes in fact. Sally was sure the damn bag was filling itself tighter and tighter each time. All she knew for sure was that she was glad it was over for now, and that she hoped next time the infernal piece of equipment would fill itself to bursting... Literally. As the bag unfastened itself from her face, she grabbed it and slung it against a nearby wall, where it shrieked upon impact before landing and scurrying out of sight.

"Damn that thing..." She grunted, bringing a paw to her rounded, oat-packed belly and grimacing at its tenderness. Yes there was definitely more this time: She almost felt stuffed, "I need to get out of here... before that pain in the ass comes back... again."

Yet all Sally really felt like doing was lying there on the floor. Her belly still felt too full of crappy filler to move too much, and she still felt achy from the fall earlier. Thus it took her a couple more minutes before she attempted to sit up, doing so with a bit more effort than normal thanks to her gut and the soreness she felt from her impact with the ground. While she was thinking of standing up however, a rather unsettling sloshing sound caught her attention. As she was getting to her feet (Or hooves rather), she slowly turned around towards the source of the sound.

As she had feared, it was the second feedbag she had glimpsed down the hallway before, the one stuffed with lard instead of oats. In fact the thing was so full it seemed to be weighed down considerably, its movement slow and sluggish as it sloshed and dragged its greasy cargo down the hall, leaving a disgusting trail of yellow ooze behind it as bits of lard dripped and dribbled loose.

"Shit..." Sally said, gaping at the monstrous satchel in horror while slowly backing away.

But then she felt something suddenly wrapping tightly about her left leg, causing her to scream out in absolute fright. She looked down to see the empty feedbag clinging to her pudgy leg with one strap, the other thrashing freely through the air. Sally tried to pull the thing off of her leg, but as she did so the other strap lashed around her arms, effectively binding the three limbs together and causing her to fall once more to the ground.

"No dammit! LET ME GO!" She cried out in vain as she struggled on the ground against the empty feedbag while the lard-packed one dragged itself towards the helpless farm girl.

Sally was unable to stop the lardbag as it carefully gripped her head in its tendrils, pulling its body and its repulsive contents towards the bovine's scrunched snout. The cowgirl's mind reeled with disgust as her muzzle slid into the lard filling the bag, and while she wanted to keep her mouth shut and tried her best to achieve as much, like with the other bags she hardly had a choice. She immediately found herself mindlessly noshing at the greasy mess her face was now jammed into, and while it didn't taste quite as bad as it looked, she really did not enjoy having to devour something so purely unhealthy and harmful to her body. Sally groaned as more and more of the nasty substance oozed down her throat, filling her already stuffed belly for what felt like hours. It was only a few minutes before the contents of the lardbag had been completely emptied into her however, and she found herself chewing on thin air instead and smacking her lips messily. The empty feedbag binding her slowly loosened up before scurrying away down the hall. The bag around her mouth soon did the same, though quite a bit more sloppily as goopy blobs of lard dripped from her lips and chin, the cowgirl grunting and gasping as she breathed in fresh air once more.

The stuffed, bloated farmgirl lay against the floor on her back now, groaning and moaning from the pain of her distended stomach and the stupor of her greasy, horrible fattening "meal". She brought a trembling paw gingerly to her stomach, finding that even though her overalls still remained amazingly clasped, her shirt had now ridden up her belly almost to her breasts. She whined and grunted groggily, shaking her head as her paw moved across the giant swollen curve of her gut, not liking that she was finding quite a bit more than she had expected. Finally after feeling her gurgling, sloshing stomach over for the third time, she laid back against the stone tile floor, staring dully at the ceiling before her heavy eyelids fell across her vision and she drifted into a glut-induced slumber...

15533111111221121111222.content:
The cowgirl ran up the staircase as fast as she could, but stopped halfway up as she heard it creak loudly, threateningly under her weight. She gasped and stopped, holding onto the banister as she looked down at the seemingly weak step while pressing down with her hoof, tentatively giving it more pressure than usually. The step bent, but surprisingly still held firm, most likely thanks solely to the support of the surround structure, and so she took one quick glance back at the pursuing feedbags and continued to run to the top of the stairs.

As soon as she reached the top of the flight, she barreled through the door, stumbled to stop her momentum, and then pulled the door shut behind her, flipping a small latch on the wall next to it to keep it locked. She leaned against the wooden barrier, panting lightly and trying not to notice how her rounded potbelly almost sagged against the surface of the door. Feeling a cool breeze brought her out of her rested state momentarily however, and as she turned around and examined her surroundings, she realized that not only was she now outside, she was in the same exact courtyard when she first entered the castle!

“That’s… That’s impossible!?” She gasped, completely dumbfounded.

It had to have been, Sally did not remember seeing a side door into the courtyard at all, but here it was, right across from the stable! And then there was the matter of having climbed two sets of stairs, and yet now she was back at ground level. Just what the hell was going on with this place?

Unfortunately she didn’t have time to think this through before she was brought back to reality by the sounds of the feedbag’s straps clattering against the other side of the door. It was soon joined by the hammering of the leathery appendages of the other bag she had seen before, but thankfully it seemed as though they were once again trapped on the other side and had to find a way around to reach her. It was over for now: She was safe once again…

…Until the heavy feedbags started hammering against the door with their bodies. Sally’s eyes widened as she felt the door budge considerably, despite the lock, and she backed away from the besieged portal. The cowgirl watched, terrified, as the feedbags rammed against the flimsy door once more, forcing it to bend against the lock so much that the one containing the oats was able to wedge itself between its edge and the wall. The monstrous satchel squirmed and writhed frantically, the single leather strap that had made it through to the other side flailing through the air while oats spilled across the cobblestones. Sally rushed up the steps to the keep, pulling open the doors and slamming them shut once more behind her, mirroring the first time she had ever entered this foreboding foyer. In fact, Sally felt overwhelmed by a feeling of déjà vu as she once more looked around at the disturbing paintings and sculptures.

As she looked around, she caught sight of the empty painting once again, the one she had been trapped in… Or maybe dreamed she had been trapped in last night. But as she looked at it from the door, afraid to get any closer, she saw the messy state of the feast in the art piece, and knew immediately that is was no dream. She stared at the painting nervously, woken from her troubled daydreams by the all-too-familiar sound of the feedbags scratching at the wooden door behind her. Wary to get any nearer to the side of the room and anxious to find some way out of this place still, Sally plodded over to the left side of the entrance hall to examine the ways out of here. There were only two exits on this side, one was a short but wide hallway directly in front of her with more doors leading out of that, and another was a door smaller than the others before in the side of the staircase. Sally pondered for a moment before making her choice of path.
15533111111221121111222.title: This Doesn't Seem Right...
